about-:
Textile City is a commercial zone in International City divided into a territorial and a free zone area. Spread over an enormous land space of 6M sq. ft., the Textile city is open for business since 2006. The build-up space of about 2.2M sq. ft. is taken up by the warehouses, showrooms and offices. The economic zone of Textile City is a joint venture between TEXMAS, which is an association of Dubai-based textile merchants and the government body of Ports Customs and Free Zones Authority.
The total cost of the project was about AED 250M, which was carried out by TEXMAS. The government supported the development by providing dedicated Dubai Customs and Immigration Services (EZW) for textile merchants and business owners. The plans are to legally register the companies and their products in the area, so it is convenient to carry out trade activity with the main goal of improving international trade relations and establishing an optimal image for Dubai as a trading hub in the textile business.
Textile City is located closer to the intersection of Ras Al Khor Road (E44) and Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road (E311), the area has quick access to Dubai International Airport and seaports in the city.
in-a-nutshell:
A free economic Zone and a long-term government project
Easy access to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311)
Neighbouring areas include Al Warsan and Al Warqaa
Dedicated to the textile industry and its trading
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Textile City highlights unique features for business owners, such as
It offers a complete ownership opportunity for foreign businessmen
Availability of spacious community halls for office gatherings
It is a free zone establishment
Secure and gated area
Free parking spaces
The infrastructure of the economic zone includes modern office premises and showrooms, storage facilities and selling spaces, in which the necessary utilities and social facilities are available. Since it is a joint project of the Dubai government and private businesses, the area allows a number of opportunities and competitive advantages for international trade.
PROPERTIES IN TEXTILE CITY
Since it is a completely commercial area, the properties in Textile City consist of warehouses, factories and offices. Most of the people who work here live in nearby residential communities. Several different types of warehouses are for rent in Textile City. The annual rent for such units mainly depends upon the square feet of area, starting from AED 150k for a 3,800 sq. ft. and going up to AED 900k for a warehouse with 27,000 sq. ft. To buy a warehouse in Textile City, one needs to stack AED 17M for a 27,880 sq. ft. warehouse.
transportation-and-parking-spaces:
Parking in the area is no hassle as both covered and open parking spaces are easily available.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN TEXTILE CITY
Getting around in the community is easy if you have a private car. If this is not the case, for moving around frequently within the area you will need to hire a cab. To move in and out of the area, public transport options nearby include bus and metro services.
Several bus stations are located around the area including the Dubai Textile City bus stop and Dubai Textile City Main Gate bus stop on Warsan 1 Street. As for metro stations, Centrepoint Metro Station is the closest one, 15-minutes away.
Centrepoint (previously Al Rashidiya) metro station is the nearest subway-hailing facility
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near: Many supermarkets are available nearby as Textile City is surrounded by residential areas. A large superstore for grocery shopping in bulk includes Fairways Supermarket, just 5-minutes away. Other supermarkets near Textile City include Alina Grocery, Panda Panda Supermarket, Save More Supermarket, Souq Al Madina Supermarket and Home Care Supermarket. These are all available within 15-minute of the driving radius.
mosques-near: Many mosques near Textile City are easily available allowing workers to avail a prayer break when required. The closest one is the Dragon Mart Mosque, while others at a close distance include Mariyam bint Alhindi Mosque, Saif Khadim Al Rumaithi Masjid and Abdul-Razaq Abdul-Aziz Al-Mutauwa Mosque.
other-places-of-worship:
People belonging to the Christian community can go to the district of Umm Hurair to access the nearest churches. Holy Trinity Church, The Dubai City Church, Immanuel Assemblies of God Church and New Life Fellowship Dubai Church are a few to name.
Shrinathji Temple is a Hindu temple dedicated to Shrinathji in Nathdwara
Gurudwara Al Aweer in Ras Al Khor Industrial Area is a Sikh temple near Textile City. It takes a 15-minute drive to reach the place. Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple is located only about 16-minutes away to facilitate the Buddhist community. For Hindu temples, one needs to travel almost half an hour to reach Al Fahidi, where there are various Hindu temples concentrated in one place such as ShrinathJi Temple, Shiva Temple and Shree Krishna Haveli.
NURSERIES AND SCHOOLS NEAR TEXTILE CITY
Several nursery schools are found in the neighbouring clusters including,
Little Sprouts Early Learning Center
Gingle Kids Early Learning Center
Kids World International
Circle Time
Gingle Kids Early Learning Center is one of the best nurseries in the International City offering a pre-nursery programme and a kindergarten programme for children between the age of 3 to 6 years. Following the EYFS curriculum, the nursery school focuses on the ‘learning through play’ approach.
Schools near Textile City are:
Primus Private School
GEMS Founders School
Kings’ School Nad Al Sheba
GEMS Founders School is a part of the GEMS Education family of international schools
The Primus Private School is one of the best schools in Al Warqa offering the CBSE curriculum to students from studying Pre-Kindergarten to Grade 12. It is a  co-education school and its KHDA rating is good. GEMS Founders School is in the Al Barsha South community, following the British curriculum. Kings’ School Nad Al Sheba is a top-notch primary educational centre that follows the National Curriculum of the UK. It provides quality early years education to children from foundation to Grade 6.
Popular universities like the University of Birmingham Dubai, Al Ghurair University, Amity University Dubai Campus and Zayed University are all available within just 13-minutes of drive from Textile City.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Clinics and hospitals near Textile City include:
Aster Clinic
Fakeeh University Hospital
Right Health Ruby Clinic LLC
Access Clinic is the closest option for Textile City workers, available within a few minutes of drive in the International City Russia Cluster, while the Right Health Ruby Clinic is just a minute further in China Cluster. For large multispecialty hospitals, Fakeeh University Hospital is a popular choice as it is the nearest one from the area, just 10-minutes away.
nearby-areas:
Though Textile City is a commercial zone, it is part of a major residential community International City. It is strategically located next to Al Awir Road (E44), a major highway that makes travelling easier to other parts of the emirate. The neighbouring areas that surround Textile City include:
Al Warqa
Al Warsan
Nad Al Sheba
Academic City
Dubai Silicon Oasis
Al Warqa covers the whole northern side of the community, while Nad Al Sheba and Dubai Silicon Oasis (DSO) are both situated towards the southeastern and southern sides. Academic City is just 13-minutes worth of drive from the area and Al Warsan is situated on the western end.
local_cafe
LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
MALLS NEAR TEXTILE CITY
Notable shopping malls near Textile City are:
Souq Warsan
China Mall Dubai
Dubai Festival City Mall
Dubai Festival City Mall offers the best of shopping, entertainment and dining in Dubai
The shopaholics in the area can head down to one of the most premium malls in the city, Dubai Festival City Mall. Located in Dubai Festival City (DFC), the mall features many popular international brands, such as
Marks and Spencer
River Island
Nine West
Topshop
Zara
Besides these best shops in the Dubai Festival City Mall, you will also find a wide range of jewellery stores and furniture shops as well. The mall is also known for housing the chicest dining outlets, including Hard Rock Cafe, PF Chang’s and Peppermill.
China Mall Dubai, also majorly known as Dragon Mart is a large shopping centre in International City popular for its wide variety of China products. Besides retail stores, you will also find top dining places here. It is only 7-minutes away from the area. Another traditional shopping destination nearby is Souq Warsan, which is just 13-minutes away.
Dragon Mart always has tons of community events for residents in the neighbouring areas
restaurants-near:
There are several casual and fine dining restaurants near Textile City and these dining places will offer you a variety of cuisines. You can enjoy all the dishes including Asian, Arabian, Mediterranean and International. Some popular ones nearby include:
Splendid Restaurant
Lamama Restaurant
Green Garden Restaurant
While some places with dine-in and takeaway options include
Foodies Restaurant
Seasons Restaurant
Mall View Restaurant
Mandi Time Restaurant
New Yummy Restaurant
Shalimar Gujranwala Restaurant
Foodies Restaurant and Green Garden Restaurant are two casual dining restaurants famous for their Indian and South Indian cuisines, while at Mandi Time you will enjoy a popular Mediterranean dish named Mandi. Seasons Restaurant in the Italy Cluster offers top-notch Pakistani and Indian dishes. Enjoy a taste of European dining at Lamama Restaurant, or get a variety of Chinese flavours at Splendid Restaurant.
beaches-near:
If you would like to take a break from all the industrial work, try planning a day at the beach and head out towards the JBR road. Here you will find a ton of options to enjoy quality time with family or even alone. The area offers many public beaches packed with unlimited activities. One of the most popular beaches here is Jumeirah Public Beach.
Jumeirah Public Beach
Another popular beach will be Al Mamzar Beach and it will also require the same minute of drive to reach. Activities at the beaches include a number of water sports such as kayaking, paragliding and banana boat rides, besides there are several shaded places to enjoy sunsets with loved ones and plenty of dining options available on the promenades.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
The closest landmarks are:
NOVO Cinemas
Dubai Safari
Safari Park Dubai is a major attraction for those who love animals. Located just 13-minutes away from Textile City, this safari park is home to a number of exotic mammals. Those who like to get a peek inside the jungles of Africa and Asia can visit here as many animals here come from the native Eastern side, while a lot of the African wildlife such as Arabian Oryx, Addax and sand gazelle also reside here. Moreover, little children are also welcome here as there is an animal farm where your kids can learn all about farm animals.
The NOVO Cinemas in the Dubai Festival City Mall is available within 14-minutes of the drive. It is a perfect place for movie buffs where one can enjoy the screening of the latest movies.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
Visitors and workers can enjoy several outdoor activities in and near the area. These activities include walkways in the nearby parks or outdoor sports such as basketball and tennis on the outdoor sports grounds. Popular parks near the area are:
Al Warqa Park
Mushrif Park
Stars Park
The large Mushrif Park has many amenities for both children and adults
For fitness and physical training, one can join the local gyms including Fitness Terminal Men’s Gym, Optima Fitness Gym, V Fitness Gym and many others. A gym exclusive to ladies is named, Fitness Terminal Ladies Gym, located 12-minutes away from Textile City. Other popular gyms nearby are named Body Arts Fitness Gym, Fitness Style Gym and Hardcore Gym. All of these are available within 10-minutes of driving distance.
Some salons and spas near Textile City are:
Green Trend Men’s Personal Care
Beautify Me Ladies Salon & Spa
Top Notch Ladies Salon
Headzup Gents
By visiting the nearest massage centres such as Green Trend Men’s Personal Care, one can get pamper themselves by spending a day out at the spa. Here you will enjoy services like massages, nail treatment and facial and hair care. For personal grooming, the nearest beauty salons are Beautify Me Ladies Salon & Spa and Top Notch Ladies Salon. These salons offer services like waxing, makeup and hair styling. Headzup Gents is a exclusive salon for men, just 5-minutes away.
things-to-consider: If you are looking for a textile business setup in Dubai, look no further as Textile City is your ideal location. It is one of the free zones of Dubai and an ideal location for business and travel. Located near many residential areas and major roads, the area gives the benefit of easy commuting to the workers. However, to start a business you will need to follow through a long list of documentation to finally get your lease approved by the government.
location_x:
Dubai International Airport is located roughly 13-minutes away
Downtown Dubai and Business Bay are an 18-minute drive
13-minutes to Academic City

about-:
Dubai Marina is a buzzing tourist destination and a vibrant community with many unrivalled residential properties. Located at the gateway of the world’s largest man-made marina, the aptly named Marina Gate is one of the most prominent real estate projects in Dubai.  The complex of Marina Gate features two residential towers and one hotel/serviced apartment tower. The developer behind this project is Select Group, one of the leading real estate development and investment companies in the United Arab Emirates (UAE). Launched in 2014, these towers have been divided into three phases.
The first phase involved the construction of the 677 ft. tower Marina Gate 1, which was completed in 2018. The second phase of construction began in 2016 and it involved building the 846 ft. tall Marina Gate 2, which is still under construction. The final of the trio, the 736 ft. Jumeirah Living Marina Gate project. This building will be managed by Jumeirah Group International – an international luxury hotel chain – while being under the ownership of Select Group.
With modern interiors to match, the construction involves international-standard architecture that is defined by cutting-edge glass, steel and concrete forms. The architect behind Marina Gate’s iconic design is Aedas. The buildings’ curtain walls/claddings have been provided by Cladtech International LLC (CTI), a renowned façade consultant.
Marina Gate is a complex with three high-rise buildings
The tri-tower flagship residential project of Marina Gate features an impressive choice of rental and freehold properties such as studios, 1 to 5-bedroom flats, serviced apartments, penthouses and villas. The three towers are connected to each other by walkways through a terraced and an eight-level podium. The mezzanine and ground floors will feature a retail mall with around 50 outlets, a supermarket, salons, a gym and sports facilities.
The podium will also house over 1,400 villas and other tree-lined recreational areas. It faces Arabian Gulf from one side and is bordered by the picturesque marina on the other. Marina Gate is also close to the bridge that connects the mainland with the island development. It can also access one of the recently launched tram stations.
in-a-nutshell:
A building complex of three towers
Offers a wide range of residential properties
Tower 1 is 677 ft. tall and contains 52 floors above ground
Tower 2 is 846 ft. tall and contains 64 floors above ground
The 736 ft. Tower 3 is under construction and will contain 56 floors
Eight elevators in Tower 1 and nine elevators in Tower 2
Includes a separate service elevator in each tower
Features a scenic podium that has walkways linking the towers
Commercial properties sprawled across ground and mezzanine levels
Houses podium-level villas
Will be home to Jumeirah Living Marina Gate hotel apartments
Has a temperature-controlled infinity pool
Features championship level sports courts
Close to The Walk at Jumeirah Beach Residence
Close to Marina Towers Tram Station
Ample parking space for residents as well as visitors
business
BUILDING DETAILS
Facilities in Marina Gate, Dubai
PARKING
Parking in Marina Gate isn’t a hassle for resdients as there is an expansive ground which can accommodate around 500 vehicles at a time. Marina Gate also has GreenParking facility, a leading parking management system that provides parking guidance, reservation and valet services as well as EV charging stations for visitors and residents alike.
ELEVATORS
There are eight high-speed elevators in Marina Gate along with a dedicated service elevator. Marina Gate 2 has nine swift-moving elevators and an additional service elevator. The entire complex is wheelchair accessible.
SECURITY, CENTRAL AIR-CONDITIONING AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES 
Some of the in-house facilities and amenities include CCTV coverage and key card security access. Marina Gate also offers paid housekeeping services such as ironing, laundry and dry cleaning. The complex follows a no-smoking policy but it also includes a designated area for smokers.
GYM AND FITNESS FACILITIES 
A few recreational and wellness facilities include a full-size basketball court, state-of-the-art, a dual-level fitness centre that has all the latest gym equipment plus steam and sauna facilities. There are championship level well-illuminated squash and paddle tennis courts. Decked on the podium level, there is a well-maintained infinity pool and a separate pool for kids. There is also a children’s playroom at Marina Gate.
LIFESTYLE AMENITIES
One of the best features of Marina Gate is its direct access to Marina Walk, a top leisure destination in Dubai. Encircled by the sea, this pedestrianized promenade is lined with speedboats and luxury yachts on one side and is dotted with a wide selection of restaurants and cafés on the other. Apart from eating out, Marina Gate residents can go for an evening stroll, take a morning walk or ride a rented bike there.
CONCIERGE AND GUEST SERVICES 
Residents are offered 24-hour concierge services in Marina Gate. Wi-Fi is available in every area and is free of charge.
Marina Gate Floor Plans 
Studio apartments in Marina Gate consist of two different unit types
1-bedroom apartments in Marina Gate consist of five different unit types
2-bedroom apartments in Marina Gate consist of seven different unit types
3-bedroom apartments in Marina Gate consist of four different unit types
4-bedroom apartments in Marina Gate consist of one unit type
floor plans for Marina Gate.
Apartment Types in Marina Gate, Dubai
Marina Gate features two residential towers and one hotel/serviced apartment tower.
First to be completed, the 52-floor Tower 1 (Marina Gate 1) stands at a height of 206 metres and includes 399 residential flats and a total of 415 units. The total built-up area (BUA) of this tower is 1,139,500 sq. ft. The tallest of the three, 66-floor Tower 2 (Marina Gate 2) stands at a height of 256 metres and features a total BUA of 1,346,500 sq. ft. Out of the total 535 units, 511 will be apartments and eight will be villas. Once completed, the off-plan Jumeirah Living Marina Gate (Marina Gate 3) will feature 56 floors above ground, rising at a height of 736 ft. It will offer 389 private residences, 104 hotel apartments and 15 villas.
Offering extra comfort, the apartments include closets, non-feather pillows, drying rack for clothing, clothes stand, flat-screen TV, refrigerator, coffee machine, and kitchenware.
STUDIO APARTMENTS IN MARINA GATE
Available in all three towers, the studios in Marina Gate come in two types of configurations. Their sizes range between 535 sq. ft. and 620 sq. ft. They are larger in size as compared to other studio flats in Dubai.
1-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA GATE
There are five types of floor plans available for 1-bed apartments in Marina Gate. Their sizes range from 627 sq. ft. to 982 sq. ft. They will either have one or two bathrooms. Kitchens in these apartments have open-plan layouts. The cooking space includes floor-to-ceiling cabinets, wall-mounted shelves, an oven, exhaust hoods, and long counters that extend into breakfast bars.
2-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA GATE
The 2-bedroom flats in Marina Gate come seven types of floor plans. The average size of these units is 1,255 sq. ft. They come with either two or three bathrooms. The sanitary wares in these units have top-quality finishes, sleek vanity countertops, double washbasins and a wide mirror. Bathrooms also include free toiletries, towels, hairdryers and bidets.
3-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA GATE
There are four different unit types available for 3-bedroom apartments in Marina Gate. The size of these units varies between 1,800 sq. ft. and 2,153 sq. ft. They typically come with either three or four bathrooms but some may even have a total of five bathrooms.
4-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA GATE
The 4-bedroom apartments come in one type of floor plan and will offer living spaces that range between 2,300 sq. ft and 5,800 sq. ft. approximately. These units will have 5 to 6 bathrooms.
PENTHOUSES IN MARINA GATE
Built on a lavish floor plan, penthouses in Marina Gate are premium residences that are favoured by families who want to lead a lavish lifestyle. The sizes range from 3,300 sq. ft. to 5,845 sq. ft. Marina Gate penthouses contain a living room, a dining area and four bedrooms that include a master bedroom. Inclusive of the master bathroom, the number of bathrooms vary between four and six.
VILLAS IN MARINA GATE
The villas in Marina Gate are unique and are built with duplex-style layouts. Their room count ranges between 2 and 4 bedrooms, whereas the number of bathrooms lies between three and five. Few of the podium villas in Marina Gate include units with areas of 2,310 sq. ft. and 5,348 sq. ft.

NEARBY AMENITIES
Transportation near Marina Gate
The waterbus is a popular mode of transport in the city, particularly if commuters want to get from one side of Dubai Marina to the other. It can be accessed from Marine Walk Waterbus Station 2, which is a 3-minute walk from Marina Gate.
For a leisure cruise trip, there are many boat tour agencies as well as boat rental facilities one could go to. These include The Yellow Boats, See X Sea Cruise Line, Dubai D3 Yacht Rental, Love Boats UAE, and Columbus Dubai Yachts & Boats Rental. With additional charges, Marina Gate also offers airport drop-off and pick-up services.
TRAM STATIONS NEAR MARINA GATE
Dubai Marina is known for its public transportation and Marina Gate happens to enjoy a range of public transport facilities. Residents are at less than a 5-minute walk from Marina Towers Tram Station. Operated by Roads & Transport Authority (RTA), the Dubai Tram is one of the most convenient modes of transport near Marina Gate.
Especially if one wants to explore the bustling JBR promenade, the offshore Palm Jumeirah and the entire Dubai Marina area. With a fare of AED 3.00, Marina Gate residents can reach Dubai Media City in just about 5 minutes.
supermarkets-near:
Daily shopping needs can be met from these supermarkets near Marina Gate:
Spinneys
Plus Point Supermarket
Carrefour
NEARBY BUILDINGS
Princess Tower
23 Marina
The Torch
Marina Gate is located in proximity to Princess Tower, 23 Marina and The Torch. These residential buildings are located a 2 to 5-minute drive away.
Major Landmarks
A few major landmarks near Marina Gate include:
Grosvenor House
The Walk at JBR
Habtoor Grand Resort
Marina Gate is on a short distance from five-star hotels such as Dubai Marriott Harbour Hotel and Suites, Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort and Spa, Habtoor Grand Resort and Grosvenor House. The complex is just 1.8 kilometres away from The Walk at JBR. It also neighbours iconic skyscrapers such as Cayan Tower Dubai, The Torch, Princess Tower and Damac Heights.
restaurants-near:
As they step out of Marina Gate, the residents will come across a lot of dining options. Some of the restaurants in Dubai Marina near Marina Gate include:
Itsu Modern Japanese Restaurant
Reem Al Bawadi Restaurant and Café
Mir Amin
Foodies who like to experience new flavours will be in for a treat as the area is dotted with restaurants serving a variety of cuisines. An all-you-can-eat and takeaway chain, Itsu Modern Japanese Restaurant in Murjan Tower is a go-to place for sushi, salmon sashimi and miso soup. Featuring canopies of grapevine runners and a delightful green environment, Reem Al Bawadi Restaurant and Café offers Lebanese delicacies such as mixed grill, mezze platter and smoky dips.
The Marina Walk, a stone’s throw away, features a myriad of eateries such as the Mexican-favourite Salsa, the traditional Mir Amin and the quirky Grill Republic Restaurant and Café. There, one can go to Pie Face for a range of flavoured pies, Tony Roma’s for ribs and char-grilled steaks, and Nando’s for the popular Afro-Portuguese chicken.
Those looking for licensed options can go for:
Underground Pub
ICON Bar & Lounge
Shades
One can even enjoy a 2-hour dinner cruise on the Monalisa Yacht that features a restaurant deck, a separate bar deck and a dance floor. Perfect for hosting events with skyscrapers and glimmering sea as the backdrop, the party boat caters an array of items in its international buffet menu.
things-to-consider: In terms of facilities, amenities and accommodation quality, Marina Gate undoubtedly excels. People who have pets might want to reconsider though as the complex has strict policies for allowing pets into the premise.

about-: Fortunato is a residential project comprising apartments and townhouses in District 11 of Jumeirah Village Circle. This residential project was launched by Al Tajir Real Estate in 2008 and completed by 2014. The area is home to 5-storey residential buildings surrounded by townhouses.
in-a-nutshell:
Situated in District 11 of Jumeirah Village Circle
A project by Al Tajir Real Estate
Project completed in 2014
Offers freehold properties
Properties include apartment buildings and townhouses
Close to Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311)
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Boasting a range of amenities, Fortunato is set in the heart of JVC. Key features of the sub-district are:
Secured and gated community
Proximity to a number of amenities
Family-friendly area
The gated community features low-rise residential buildings and townhouses. Facilities in the area include parks, a health club, walking and jogging trails, a swimming pool, medical centres and schools.
A family friendly residential cluster in JVC
Properties in Fortunato Jumeirha Village Circle
Fortunato in Jumeirah Village Circle include studios, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments. The community also offers a few 2-bedroom and 4-bedrooms townhouses. The residential units depicts Mediterranean influences.
A studio unit in Fortunato JVC has a covered area of 450 sq. ft. to 525 sq. ft. Some apartments have one while others have two bathrooms. The bedroom has a built-in wardrobe. There is an open kitchen with fitted cabinets. The unit also has a small balcony attached to the living area.
A 1-bedroom apartment in Fortunato has a coverage area of 609 sq. ft. to 908 sq. ft. There are two bathrooms in the apartment. The unit is laced with marble flooring. There is a small balcony connected with the living area. The apartments have a semi-open kitchen with fitted cabinets and granite top counter.
A 2-bedroom apartment in Fortunato has a coverage area of 888 sq. ft. to 1,326 sq. ft. There are three en-suite bathrooms in the apartment. The unit includes a big living area/dining area connected to a balcony through a sliding door. Both bedrooms have a small balcony. There is a semi-open kitchen with built-in cabinets and a small storage area.
The spacious 3-bedroom unit has a coverage area of 2,349 sq. ft. Every bedroom has an attached bathroom and a built-in wardrobe. There is a spacious living room connected to the balcony through a glass sliding door. The kitchen is big and has fitted wooden cabinets.
There are several townhouses in Fortunato JVC Dubai. 2-bedroom townhouses have a coverage area of approximately 2,428 sq. ft. There is a storage area and three bathrooms in the unit. The townhouses have central heating and central air-conditioning.
A 4-bedroom townhouse in Fortunato JVC Dubai has a built-up area of 3,175 sq. ft. Some of these townhouses have four while some have five bathrooms. The living room is spacious and the kitchen is semi-open with a storage area. There is a maid’s room and a laundry room. The townhouse also has a large terrace.

WHERE IS FORTUNATO LOCATED?
Fortunato is a residential development in Jumeirah Village Circle.
WHAT TYPE OF PROPERTIES ARE AVAILABLE IN FORTUNATO JVC DUBAI?
Fortunato comprises 5-storey apartment buildings and townhouses.
WHICH LEISURE ATTRACTIONS ARE NEAR FORTUNATO IN JVC?
One can easily access several parks within the neighbourhood. As for leisure purpose, you can head over to Dubai Butterfly Garden and Dubai Miracle Garden. Both are reachable at a 10-minute drive by car.
WHERE CAN I STAY NEAR FORTUNATO JVC?
Visitors can find Bab Al Qarya Hotel at a distance of 400 metres. You can also plan your stay at FIVE Jumeirah Village or The First Collection Hotel.
IS CIRCLE MALL OPEN?
Circle Mall JVC opened to the public in April 2021. You can visit the mall from 10:00 am to 10:00 pm.

about-: Penta Villas is a row of townhouses located in a family-friendly area of JVC, District 11. It is a gated and completely secure area featuring prestigious townhouses developed by Evan Lim Penta Construction LLC. Penta Villas enjoys an ideal location, alongside Hessa Street (D61), which leads to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) and Al Khail Road (E44).
in-a-nutshell:
A close-knitted peaceful neighbourhood
Offering 4-bedroom villas built on 3-storey
Townhouse development in District 11, JVC 
Nextdoor neighbours of Motor City and Dubai Studio City
Amenities include gyms, spa, private backyards and private pools
Offers easy access to Hessa Street (D61), Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) and Al Khail Road (E44)
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
COMMUNITY OVERVIEW
Some highlighted facilities in Penta Villas include:
CCTV/Gated security
Private front yards
Two balconies and private parking
A row of semi-attached 3-storey villas that are part of a leafy neighbourhood, Penta Villas brings forth a residential community that ideally offers a life of comfort and luxury. The community is far from the hustle and bustle of city life, yet within access to all the communal facilities, one may need.
PROPERTIES IN PENTA VILLAS
Penta Villas consists of 12 luxurious semi-detached villas. Each villa comprises of 4-bedrooms spread over two floors in addition to the ground floor.
Serene and clean neighbourhood of Penta villas
The houses have a private yard, a maid’s room, four attached bathrooms along with a powder room, sizeable balconies in the bedrooms and a semi-furnished kitchen. For quality development, the villas come with furnishings and marble flooring. These houses span more than 4,000 sq. ft. of the area featuring modern amenities. It costs around AED 2.4M to buy a 4-bedroom villa in Penta Villas.

transportation-and-parking-spaces:

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN PENTA VILLAS
Public transport options include bus stops and green line metro stations. The parent community, JVC is dotted with several bus stations at convenient distances. Residents can catch the bus from the nearest JVC Diamond Views 3 bus stop within a 2-minute walk. Other bus stops near Penta Villas within 10-minutes of walking distance are JVC Mirabella Villas 6 bus stop, JVC Judi Palace Apartments 1 bus stop and JVC Qamash Blvd A-1 bus stop.
Dubai Internet City Metro Station 2 is located at a drive of 11-minutes and it is the nearest point to catch the subway. A taxi is also easily available in the area.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near:
There are several renowned supermarkets near Penta Villas such as:
Spinneys
Choithrams Manhattan Tower
All Day Minimart
West Zone Fresh Supermarket
Spinneys is one of the leading supermarket chains in the middle east. The popular superstore has several outlets across the UAE and the nearest to the area is located at a walking distance of about 6-minutes. Along with the grocery and edible items, Spinneys has a range of households, beauty products and goods for baby care. The superstore is known to have a wide variety of imported collections too.
A branch of the popular supermarket chain, Choithrams in JVC
The area has a lot of local marts in the neighbourhood such as Eight Supermarket at a 5-minute walking distance, Ever Fresh Mart Supermarket within a 10-minute walk and Smile On Supermarket at a distance of about 6-minutes on foot.
mosques-near:
Circle Mall Mosque is the nearest mosque, residents can reach the prayer point within a few minutes on foot. Masjid JVC is a community mosque located at a drive of only 5-minutes. Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque and Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf are other mosques near Penta Villas within prompt reach.
Mosque outside the popular Circle Mall
other-places-of-worship:
The Winning Generation Gospel Assembly is a Christian church located at a drive of nearly 10-minutes in Al Barsha South. City Hill Church Dubai is located within a driving radius of less than 15-minutes. Christians living in the area can also head to Jebel Ali Village as the suburb has several different churches belonging to different sects of Christianity.
Hindu residents can go to the Hindu Temple Dubai in Jebel Ali, which is home to over 16 deities. Guru Nanak Darbar is a gurdwara to facilitate the Sikh population in Dubai. Both of these places are situated in Jebel Ali, at a drive of only 15-minutes.

JSS International School
Global Indian International School
Nord Anglia International School
JSSIS provides one of the leading curriculums (ICSE)
Being one of the best schools in Al Barsha, The Nord Anglia International School offers the International Baccalaureate (IB) Curriculum and the National Curriculum of England. Global Indian International School, also part of the Al Barsha community, is a co-educational school offering the Indian curriculum from Grades 1 to 12.

Right Health Karama Medical Center
Mediclinic Me’aisem
Mediclinic Parkview Hospital
Mediclinic Parkview Hospital is 11-minutes away, while the Mediclinic Me’aisem is a distance of 13-minutes. Right Health Karama Medical Center is located right within JVC, only 3-minutes far from Penta Villas.
Saudi German Hospital (SGH) and Al Zahra Hospital Dubai are advanced care tertiary hospitals near Penta Villas. It takes a 12 to 15-minute drive via Hessa Street (D61) to reach there. Al Zahra Hospital is accredited with the Joint Commission International and serves a broad range of ailments in its 187-bed capacity.

MALLS NEAR PENTA VILLAS
Shopping malls near Penta Villas are merely 15-minutes away, such as:
Al Khail Avenue Mall
The Meadows Souk
The Springs Souk
Circle Mall
Circle Mall is a cutting-edge lifestyle meets food retail space
Al Khail Avenue Mall is a recently built shopping mall just a few minute’s drive from the villas, offering a vast collection of retail stores, restaurants and cafés. In the springs Souk, you will find a supermarket named Choithrams while there are many traditional stores at both souks.
Circle Mall is a community mall in JVC, located within a walking distance of the area. There are approximately 80 retail and 40 dining outlets along with a 60,000 sq. ft. of gym space. The mall is spread over three floors along with a rooftop which is used for alfresco dining. There is a dedicated space of 126,000 sq. ft. for Spinneys and Nesto Hypermarket within the mall.
restaurants-near:
Residents of Penta Villas will find a wide range of restaurants nearby, including:
Defne Turkish Restaurant
Desert Wok Restaurant
Socialicious Restaurant – House of Asian Blends
Lokmat Baladna
Trattoria by Cinque
All these are available within the JVC community, available within a maximum 10-minute driving range, offering both dine-in and takeaway.
Trattoria by Cinque is an Italian restaurant in JVC. The restaurant serves three meals a day, starts serving at 06:30 in the morning till 12:00 at the night. Every Monday from 06:30 pm till 10:30 pm is a ladies’ night where female customers get to enjoy various discount deals. Socialicious Restaurant is known for its cosy ambience and courteous staff. The popular dishes are Burmese Khao Suey and Laksa Soup with Passion Mojito in beverages.
beaches-near:
Kite Beach is one of the most popular beaches in Dubai
For a beach day out with family or friends, residents of Penta Villas can head towards the Jumeirah area, which requires a drive of 20 to 30-minutes. Here are some of the most popular beaches of Dubai, including the popular Jumeirah Public Beach and Pine Beach, Sufouh Beach, Kite Beach and Marina Beach.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Some leisure places and notable landmarks near the area include:
Trump International Golf Club
IMG Worlds of Adventure
Dubai Miracle Garden
Trump International Golf Club is a luxurious ground for golf lovers, just 13-minutes of drive away from the area. It is considered one of the best golf courses in Dubai and has a wide collection of chic restaurants. There is also IMG Worlds of Adventure, a large indoor amusement park located 18-minutes away from the area. It has a plethora of rides and games for kids. It takes around 20-minutes for the car to reach here from Penta Villas.
If you are fond of colourful flowers and vibrant themed parks, Dubai Miracle Garden is the closest attraction for you, just 11-minutes away. Dubai Butterfly Garden is located just beside the Miracle Garden. It consists of around 10 environment-controlled domes. These domes serve as home to more than 15,000 butterflies belonging to 45 different species. There is an Educational Area in the park which facilitates young visitors in their curiosity for the winged creature.
Dubai Miracle Garden is a family-favourite place to hang out

Outdoor activities in the Penta Villas Dubai include:
Gymnasiums
Kids playground
Community parks
There are many outdoor parks in the area which feature children’s play areas and walking and cycling tracks. Moreover, you will find sports courts where older children can polish their basketball or football skills.
Prime Fitness JVC, Fitness 101 – JVC and EMS Fitness – Dubai are some of the gyms in JVC that residents can access in less than 10-minutes. Some of the salons and spas nearby include:
Dial A Nail
BerryCut Beauty Salon

SunShine Spa & Massage Center
These are some of the top-rated places to visit when in the mood for personal grooming.

This residential community has one setback for people: the metro service is far away from the community and ones need to travel by bus or private conveyance to reach the nearest subway station.

Grand Paradise is a popular community in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). Boasting a prime location, this up and coming area is equipped with modern facilities and offers a tranquil environment. It caters to people who are on the lookout for a spacious property where they can raise a family.
The 5-bedrooms townhouses and villas that are available provide all the amenities you could need. The surrounding area features verdant landscaping and allows residents to lead an active lifestyle. The community is located next to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, E311 and Al Khail Road, E44.

community-overview:
Residents of Grand Paradise JVC Dubai get to live in a serene environment that features jogging tracks and walking paths. There is even a green park where families can relax, have a picnic and play sports. As the outdoor space has an expansive landscape, it is possible to spend more time outdoors.
The neighbourhood provides plenty of green space
The community provides the ultimate convenience as it is near schools, nurseries, supermarkets, hospitals, clinics and malls. It is a great choice for raising a family.
properties-in:
Residential properties in Grand Paradise, JVC Dubai
The properties available in JVC Grand Paradise include 5-bedroom villas and townhouses that cover around 1,808 sq. ft. to 4,500 sq. ft. Each unit is well-designed and has central air conditioning, built-in wardrobes and a huge living area. Moreover, there is a balcony, a maid’s room, a private garden and a parking area. The balcony offers views of the landscaped community.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN GRAND PARADISE JVC
Residents who buy or rent a villa in Grand Paradise get a dedicated parking spot with their property which allows them to park up to two vehicles. For more parking space, it is possible to use street parking.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN GRAND PARADISE JUMEIRAH VILLAGE CIRCLE
One of the major benefits of living in The Grand Paradise JVC is that residents get to take complete advantage of public transport Dubai. They can rely on the bus or metro to commute. To hail a Dubai bus, you just need to walk to JVC Noor Residences bus station or JVC Le Grand Chateau bus station.
If you prefer taking the metro, there are a few metro stations that take about 15 minutes to reach. These include Al Khail Metro Station, Al Furjan Metro Station and Discovery Gardens Metro Station. Otherwise, you can take a cab or stick to private conveyance.
Plenty of parking and bus stops in the area
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near:
There are a number of supermarkets that are near JVC Grand Paradise Dubai. You can head over to any of the following to grab some groceries:
Broz Grocery
Allday Minimart
The Express Cart
Greens Supermarket
The above grocery stores are within walking distance. You can also head over to The Manhattan to shop for essentials at a Choithrams outlet. It takes about 10 minutes to reach and is known as one of the best supermarkets in Dubai.
Allday Minimart is always stocked
MOSQUES IN GRAND PARADISE JVC DUBAI
The Grand Paradise JVC residents are close to the mosques in Jumeirah Village Circle such as:
Bin Huraiz Mosque
Sports City Mosque
Barsha South Mosque
Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque
Masjid Fatima Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf
Each of the above mosques can be reached within 5 to 10 minutes.
Saleh Bin Lahej Mosque
other-places-of-worship:
Hindu residents can head over to the Bur Dubai temples to pray. The temples are dedicated to the Hindu Gods. Bur Dubai is just half an hour away.
As for Sikh residents, they can pray at Guru Nanak Darbar which is the biggest Gurdwara in the region. It is located in Jebel Ali and can be reached within 15 minutes.
On the other hand, there are also a variety of churches in Dubai such as Dubai Mar Thoma Church and St. Francis of Assisi Church. Each of these is just 15 minutes away.
SCHOOLS NEAR GRAND PARADISE JUMEIRAH VILLAGE CIRCLE
Living in Jumeirah Village Circle provides quick access to prestigious education institutes. If you have small kids, they can study at the nurseries in Jumeirah Village Circle which include Ladybird Nursery and Kids World Nursery.
Parents of older children can consider the nearby schools:
Arcadia School
Sunmarke School
JSS International School
Arcadia School is a popular school which welcomes students from all backgrounds. It provides the perfect environment that cultivates strong learning habits and educates students of Foundation Stage to Year 9. The school adheres to the national curriculum of England and has a variety of facilities to encourage students to pursue their special talents. It takes about 13 minutes to reach.
Another excellent school where you can send your kids to study is Sunmarke School. It has an ultra-modern campus that is equipped with high-end amenities and follows the national curriculum of the UK. A major reason why it is worth considering is because it provides different pathways at the sixth form stage. It takes 12 minutes to reach and offers bus transportation services to ensure easy access to students.
JSS International School is located within Jumeirah Village Circle
JSS International School is the nearest school from Grand Paradise JVC and is known for its top-notch academic curriculum. As it is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai, it does not compromise on providing quality education to its students. It also promotes extracurricular activities. This school is within walking distance.
clinics-and-hospitals-near: In case you require general treatment, there are a few medical institutions nearby. One of the most frequented options is Karama Medical Centre. Considered to be one of the top clinics in JVC, it offers prompt medical care and specialises in paediatrics, dentistry, orthopaedics, gynaecology and obstetrics. Other options worth considering include Mediclinic Me’aisem and American Hospital Al Barsha.
nearby-areas:
Residents of The Grand Paradise JVC are close to various communities. Towards the west are Regel Apartments and Mar Residences, whereas, Aurion Residence and Le Grand Chateau are located towards the east.
Other popular communities that you can visit include Goldenwoods Villas and Westar Les Maisonettes. Moreover, Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) and Al Barsha South are also visited.

MALLS NEAR GRAND PARADISE JVC DUBAI
Shopping is a favourite pastime of Grand Paradise Jumeirah Village Circle residents. They regularly visit the following malls:
Circle Mall
The Springs Souk
First Avenue Mall
Circle Mall is the nearest mall from the community and can be easily reached by walking. It has been developed by Nakheel and offers just about everything, from healthcare items to electronics and beauty products. Some of the shops that have opened up in the mall include Brands for Less, Cotton On, The Custom Shop, The Little Thinker and Daiso Dubai .
The Springs Souk is also widely frequented by residents. It has more than 100 retail outlets including some of the most popular brands such as Rivoli, Miniso, Sketchers and Aldo. There are also many restaurants at the mall as well as a Carrefour outlet. Hence, it is known as one of the best malls in Dubai.
First Avenue Mall is located in Motor City
Moreover, you should also visit First Avenue Mall to shop for cosmetics, clothes, accessories, electronics, and pharmaceuticals. It even has an entertainment centre, money exchange facilities and beauty centres where you can get pampered.
restaurants-near:
As there are a number of popular restaurants in JVC, residents can always head out to eat. Socialious is the perfect place to socialise with family and friends. It provides warm interiors and a pleasant ambience. Some of its best dishes include calamari, ramen, loaded nachos and baked yoghurt.
Another great spot to eat is Pinza. It is known for its mouth-watering pizzas which are made using best-cured meats such as bresaola and pepperoni and feature a signature fermented base. Some popular items on its menu include pepperoni, spicy salami, chicken fajitas and tandoori chicken. Moreover, Deccan Delight Restaurant and Bawarchi Restaurant offer Indian cuisine.
beaches-near:
The Dubai coastline is just 20 minutes away from the community. Residents spend their weekends by the beach. JBR Beach is one of the beaches that is widely frequented. It has restaurants, retail outlets and recreational facilities for water-based activities.
Kite Beach is always bustling with life
Another beach that is visited includes Kite Beach. It is the ideal place for watersports fans as it offers skating, kayaking and paddleboarding opportunities.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Leisure time is well-spent by residents of Grand Paradise JVC who visit the following spots:
Miracle Garden
Dubai Autodrome
Dreamscape Dubai

Dubai Miracle Garden is a beautiful landmark
Dubai Autodrome is also an excellent leisure spot which you can visit if you are interested in motor-sports. You will get to drive at full speed at the landmark. It only takes 15 minutes to reach and has hosted numerous racing events including the Porsche GT3 Cup Challenge ME, the Radical Middle East Cup and the Hankook 24H Dubai Endurance Race.
Situated a bit further from the community is Dreamscape VR Park which takes 20 minutes to reach. You will need to visit the Mall of the Emirates to spend time at this adventure-packed destination. It allows you to explore the depths of virtual reality as you dive through Blu adventure, an Alien Zoo and the Curse of the Lost Pearl.

There are various recreational facilities at JVC Grand Paradise that include:

Green space

The above facilities allow you to lead an active lifestyle. Otherwise, you can work out at any of the gyms in JVC including Prime Fitness Gym and New Life Fitness Gym.
As for ladies on the lookout for beauty care, they can visit the salons in JVC such as The Urban Cottage Ladies Salon and Spa or Better Beauty Salon.
community-events: There are all types of events held at Grand Paradise Jumeirah Village Circle such as Eid, Halloween and Christmas. Hence, there is always something going on in the community.
social-community-groups: To learn more about the latest happenings, you can join the Facebook group for Jumeirah Village Circle Residents. It will help you connect with people who live in the neighbourhood.
things-to-consider:
Grand Paradise JVC Dubai is situated at a prime location and offers high-end amenities. Its 5-bedroom units are designed to perfection and allow you to live in a secluded community. If you are looking for a spacious property away from the city centre, it is the best option.

There are plenty of parking spaces in Sydney Villas Jumeirah Village Circle for residents and visitors alike. Each house in the community comes with a dedicated facility for two cars while street parking is available for guests.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR SYDNEY VILLAS
In terms of public transportation near Sydney Villas Jumeirah Village Circle, there are several bus stations located nearby. These include the JVC Noor Residence bus station and JVC Samer Park bus station accessible in a 5 to 7-minute drive. The nearest metro stations are located a 15 to 20-minute drive from the community like Jumeirah Golf Estates Metro Station and Al Khail Metro Station.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near: There are plenty of supermarkets near Sydney Villas Dubai offering fresh and quality products. These include Starmart Supermarket, Cart Supermarket and Tudomart Supermarket. In a short drive of 7-minutes lie Choithrams on the ground floor of Manhattan Tower. It is one of the best supermarkets in Dubai from where residents can purchase organic foods, household items, skincare products and toiletries.
mosques-near: Saleh Bin Lahej Mosque is the nearest facility for Muslim residents of the community. They can drive via Jumeirah Village St 1 to reach the mosque in a 5-minute drive. Other mosques near Sydney Villas Dubai are Masjid Fatima Al Sayed Mohammed Yousuf Sharaf and Abdullah Mohammad Al Shirawi Mosque.
other-places-of-worship:
Christians living in the sub-community can visit the best churches in Dubai in a 15 to 20-minute drive. These include Dubai Mar Thoma Church and St. Francis of Assisi Church. Moreover, the largest Gurdwara – Guru Nanak Darbar is also located within a 15-minute drive and Bur Dubai temples are accessible within a half an hour’s drive.
SCHOOLS NEAR SYDNEY VILLAS DISTRICT 15 JVC
Parents with toddlers and school-going children can find plenty of reputable educational institutes near the community. These include Kids World Nursery JVC, Jumeirah International Nursery and Raffles Starters.
JSS International School is the nearest facility for Kindergarten to Grade 12 students. It is a private co-educational school offering the Council of Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (CICSE) curriculum. Sunmarke School is another facility located in the neighbouring community following the National Curriculum of the UK. Other schools near Sydney Villas District 15 JVC are Nord Anglia International School and Dubai Heights Academy.
clinics-and-hospitals-near: Al Das Medical Clinic in The Meadows Souk is the nearest healthcare facility for residents of the villa community. It offers services for general medicine, dental care, dermatology and paediatrics. The clinic is located a 14-minute away from the sub-district. Other clinics near Sydney Villas District 15 JVC are Right Health Karama Medical Centre and HMC Medical Centre. For further medical assistance, they can visit Mediclinic Al Sufouh and MedCare in a 16 to 20-minute drive. Both the best hospitals in Dubai offer premium healthcare services to patients.
nearby-areas:

Dubai Miracle Garden is a one-of-its-kind attraction in the city featuring 2D and 3D floral designs. It is also home to the Dubai Butterfly Garden where 15,000 butterflies are kept. Residents can reach the spot in a 12-minute drive via Hessa Street.

community-events: Dubai Autodrome is the nearest leisure spot hosting various sporting events all around the year. It will take a 13-minute drive to reach the sporting facility.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN CALIDA
Finding a parking spot isn’t a hassle for residents as each villa comes with a dedicated car parking space in Calida. The facility has enough space to accommodate two vehicles at a time. Visitors can avail the street parking facility for their cars.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN CALIDA
The popular mode of public transportation in Calida includes bus and metro service. The nearest bus stations include Sports City Golf Tower bus station and Sports City Victory Heights West Gate bus station. Both the bus stations are located at a walking distance of 8 to 15-minutes. Residents will have to drive for 14 to 16-minutes towards the west to reach the metro stations on Route 2020. These include Al Furjan Metro Station, Discovery Gardens Metro Station and Jumeirah Golf Estates Metro Station.
Those with private cars can commute using Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road running on the northern side of the community. Al Fay Road connects the neighbourhood with E311 in a 4-minute drive and with Al Khail Road (E44) in a 10-minute drive. It will take less than a 25-minute drive to reach Business Bay and Downtown Dubai using Al Khail Road or Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road.

supermarkets-near:

Grandiose Supermarket
All these grocery stores are accessible in a 6 to 8-minute drive. For larger grocery hauls, Carrefour City is a 5-minute drive from the community. Other stores nearby are New W Mart Supermarket and Greens Minimart.
mosques-near: Muslims can offer their daily and congregational prayers in Sports City Mosque, Al Abrar Mosque and Al Adel Mosque. All these mosques near Calida are located at a 5 to 10-minute drive.
other-places-of-worship:

The mixed-use development is also home to Guru Nanak Darbar, the largest Gurdwara in the region. It will take a 13-minute drive to reach the Gurdwara via D57.

The Wonder Years Nursery follows the British Early Years Foundation Stage program for 18 months to 4 Years children. The program consists of specially designed activities to maximise a child’s progress. The nursery school also offers a range of fun and sports activities such as an outdoor play area, a rider track for cycles and a garden. It is situated at a 4-minute drive from the community.
Schools near Calida are:
Victory Heights Primary School

Victory Heights Primary School follows the National Curriculum of England (NCE) for students from Foundation Stage 1 to Year 6. The school has a multipurpose court for tennis and basketball, a 3G playing field for rugby, hockey, football, and a swimming pool. The school is located a 7-minute drive from the community. Other schools nearby are GEMS United School and Sunmarke School.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:

Mediclinic Me’aisem

Mediclinic Me’aisem is a multi-speciality clinic providing premium medical services for family medicine, obstetrics and gynaecology and paediatrics. The clinic is located at a 7-minute drive in City Centre Me’aisem. Other clinics near Calida are Karama Medical Centre and Medicentres Motor City.

Subway
Paul

Chili’s

Baskin Robbins
Those looking for fine dining options can head to the best fine dining restaurants in Dubai including The Cavendish Restaurant, Rhodes W1 and Mint Leaf of London. Residents can reach these restaurants within a 15 to 20-minute drive.
beaches-near:
Al Sufouh Beach is a popular picnic spot near the community
Residents can find some of the best beaches in Dubai at a 15 to 20-minute drive. These include Al Sufouh Beach and Umm Suqeim Beach. Those who enjoy water sports activities such as jet skiing and paddleboarding can head to Jumeirah Public Beach. It will take a half an hour’s drive to reach the beach near Westar Casablanca East, JVC.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
A few of the notable landmarks near Westar Casablanca East are:
Dubai International Cricket Stadium
Dubai Autodrome
Jebel Ali Racecourse
Dubai International Cricket Stadium is one of the popular leisure spots and notable landmarks of the city. It is an iconic cricket stadium known for hosting numerous local and international tournaments. Having a seating capacity of 25,000 spectators, the stadium has a unique feature of the floodlights system named as ‘Ring of Fire’.
Another popular leisure spot for sports enthusiasts nearby the community is Dubai Autodrome. It has a 5.39-kilometre track recognised by Federation Internationale de l’Automobile (FIA). One of the first fully-integrated sports destinations of the UAE has karting tracks, a racing school, a retail plaza and a hospitality area.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
There are several community parks located in proximity to Westar Casablanca East. These parks have dedicated play areas for children and jogging tracks. Other nearby facilities include Al Barsha Pond Park and Dubai Miracle Garden.
Those who enjoy indoor fitness activities can head to the following gyms near the townhouse complex:
Al-Amir Gym
New Life Fitness Gym
Prime Fitness Gym
Al-Amir Gym has qualified professional trainers conducting personal training classes as per your schedule. The gym also offers monthly membership to fitness enthusiasts. It will take a 4 to 6-minute drive to reach these top fitness centres in JVC.
Ladies can get quality beauty care treatments from:
Creative Touch Beauty Salon & Spa
Spirals Salon
Beauty Trend Salon
Creative Touch Beauty Salon & Spa offers hair care treatments, manicures, pedicures, facials, waxing and other treatments in an affordable price range. The salon is located near Nakheel Townhouse an 11-minute drive away.
community-events: Residents can head to Jebel Ali Racecourse to attend horse racing events. Those interested in taking part in competitions and fun activities can find several options within the parent community.
social-community-groups: Intended residents can join Facebook groups to socialise and keep updated with upcoming events in the community. However, there is no specific social media group created for residents of Westar Casablanca East yet. Tenants can join Facebook groups of the parent community, these include ‘Jumeirah Village Circle Community’ and ‘Jumeirah Village Circle Residents.
things-to-consider:
Those looking for a peaceful living can consider renting a townhouse in Westar Casablanca East. However, the residential community consists of spacious houses only which might not be favourable for individuals and couples.

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR GOLDENWOODS VILLAS
Those with private vehicles can commute using Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road. Both the major highways of the emirate are accessible in a 7-minute drive.
As for public transportation near Goldenwoods Villas, residents can take the bus and metro service in a short drive. The nearest bus stations include JVC Hanover Square bus station, JVC Manhattan Tower bus station and JVC Westar la Residencia bus station. The metro stations are situated at a 10 to 12-minute drive from the community. These include the Mall of the Emirates Metro Station and Dubai Internet City Metro Station. Residents can also use taxi services such as Careem or Uber in case of urgency.

The Global Village is a multicultural amusement park located along Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road. Visitors can experience the culture of different regions through 3,500 displays kept in 76 pavilions. The retail outlets, thrilling rides and dining options are other features of the park. You can also enjoy concerts, stunt shows and stage performances at the Global Village Dubai.
Al Barsha Pond Park is a family-friendly leisure spot featuring a 1.5km jogging track, cycling trail, playgrounds and shaded play areas for children. The artificial pond in the park also offers boating facilities for a certain amount of fee.
Dubai Miracle Garden and Wild Wadi Waterpark are other notable leisure spots near the community.

about-: District 13 is one of the ten sub-districts of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) featuring a mix of apartments, villas and townhouses. The residential community is located at the southeastern end of JVC, close to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311). The neighbourhood has all the basic amenities and facilities required for peaceful living.
in-a-nutshell:
A sub-community in Jumeirah Village Circle
Residential properties include apartments, villas and townhouses
Amenities include supermarket, school, mosque and healthcare facilities
Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road and Al Khail Road lie in proximity
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
District 13 is a family-centric sub-community offering an urban lifestyle to residents. Key features of the community are:
Home to a community park
Features a wide range of residential properties
Close to the central city
The well-connected road network is another prominent feature of the community. Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road runs along with the community from the southern side while Lazuward SW connects the district to Al Khail Road.
properties-in:
Properties in District 13 include apartments, penthouses, villas and townhouses.
The low to mid-rise apartment buildings offer studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments and duplexes with an area ranging between 400 sq. ft. to 3,560 sq. ft. These apartments come with a spacious living area, bedrooms with attached bathrooms and a built-in wardrobe, a fitted kitchen and a balcony. A few apartments also offer a maid’s room, laundry room and a storeroom. The shared facilities of the apartment buildings include a fitness centre, a garden and an allocated parking spot.
Indigo Ville in JVC District 13
Townhouses in District 13 come in 3 and 4-bedroom layouts with an area ranging between 3,000 sq. ft. to 4,200 sq. ft. Most of the townhouses are two or three storeys high featuring two floors apart from the ground floor. These townhouses include a living area, a separate dining area, a well-equipped kitchen, a maid’s room and a powder room. The rooftop terrace, an outdoor pool, a private garden and a parking facility within the house are other features of these residences.

POPULAR BUILDINGS IN DISTRICT 13
District 13 is home to several apartment buildings and villa communities known for their architectural styles and other amenities.
A few of the popular buildings in District 13 are:
Pantheon Boulevard
Cappadocia
Oxford Residence
The Plaza Residences
Reef Residence
Continents Tower
Pantheon Boulevard is a five-storey apartment building in District 13, JVC
Pantheon Boulevard is a five-storey apartment building in District 13 featuring 157 studios and 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. The architecture of Pantheon Boulevard is influenced by Spanish design as it has terra-cotta roofs and iron-railed balconies. The price range of apartments for rent in Pantheon Boulevard starts from AED 36k to AED 100k per annum. The Plaza Residences is one of the popular buildings to buy apartments in JVC. It is a cluster of 4 buildings offering studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments and retail properties.
Oxford Residence is an apartment building nearby
Oxford Residence and Reef Residence are other residential buildings in the district featuring 103 and 378 studio, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments respectively. Parc Cite in District 13 JVC offers studio, 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments along with commercial space on the ground floor. The annual rent for apartments in Parc Cite ranges between AED 28k to AED 90k.
Some of the renowned villa communities of District 13 are:
Mulberry Mansions
Westar Terrace Garden
The Ghaf Tree
Mulberry Mansions is a project by Al Fara’a Properties featuring 12 Victorian-style 4-bedroom townhouses. It is a fully developed community located close to Pantheon Boulevard. The Ghaf Tree is another villa community offering 3-storey 4-bedroom townhouses.
TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN DISTRICT 13
The street parking bays can be used by visitors and residents alike
There are plenty of parking spaces in District 13 for residents and visitors alike. Those living in apartment buildings can find an allocated parking spot in the basement or podium level while houses come with a garage.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN DISTRICT 13
For public transportation in District 13, residents can find two bus stations around the corner of the community. These include the JVC Al Wazzan Tower bus station and the JVC Prime Business Tower bus station. Residents can use the metro service from Dubai Internet City metro station and Mall of the Emirates metro station in a short drive of 15-minutes.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
SUPERMARKETS IN DISTRICT 13
Cistys Supermarket and LIFE Pharmacy in the sub-community
The residential community is home to several local grocery stores and supermarkets. A few of them are:
Cistys Supermarket
Jame Jam Supermarket
Al Maya Supermarket
Trust Value Supermarket
West Zone Fresh Supermarket is another supermarket in District 13 offering quality products such as fruits and vegetables, fresh seafood and butchery, household items and beauty care products. It is located on the ground floor of the Plaza Residences.
MOSQUES IN DISTRICT 13
Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf in the community has a capacity of 1,000 worshippers with a dedicated prayer area for ladies. The mosque in District 13 also has a Quran library and ample parking spaces to facilitate Muslim community members.
other-places-of-worship:
Christian fellows can head to Emirates Baptist Church for congregational prayers. It is one of the best churches in Dubai and is accessible within a 15-minute drive. Those following Hinduism can visit Shiva and Krishna temples in a 20-minute drive.
SCHOOLS NEAR DISTRICT 13
Living in Jumeirah Village Circle is ideal for parents with toddlers and school-going children as there are plenty of options available within the boundaries. Some best nursery schools in JVC nearby are Ladybird Nursery, Kids World Nursery and Kinder Castle Nursery.

JSS International School
Nord Anglia International School
Global Indian International School
JSS International School is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai
JSS International School follows the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) curriculum for children from Kindergarten to Grade 12. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai catering to the academic and non-academic needs of more than 2000 students. It will take a 6-minute drive to reach the school. Other schools near the community are Global Indian International School and Victory Heights Primary School.

about-: Westar Les Castelets is a collection of well-designed townhouses located in District 10 of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). It is a family-oriented community developed by Westar Properties. The townhouse complex is situated in proximity to Al Khail Road.

properties-in:
The community offers 11 well-designed townhouses
Westar Les Castelets is a row of 11 townhouses which are available in a 3-bedroom layout with an additional maid’s room. Each townhouse spreads over an area of 3,600 sq. ft. and comes with a basement and two storeys above the ground.
The ground floor has a living area, a kitchen, a bedroom with an attached bathroom and a separate bathroom. Private parking spaces and a lawn are also available on this floor. The first floor has another bedroom and a terrace while the other two bedrooms are located on the second floor. Residents can use the basement as a mini theatre or extra storage area.

Dubai Autodrome is one of the popular entertainment destinations featuring a 5.39km long circuit with six different configurations. It is the UAE’s first fully-integrated sports destination sanctioned by Federation Internationale de l’Automobile (FIA). It also has a Grand Retail Plaza and Motorsport Business Park to facilitate the spectators.
Jebel Ali Racecourse is another notable leisure spot to promote the traditional sports of Arab, horse racing. It was established in 1990 following the directions of His Highness Sheikh Ahmed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum and Dhruba Selvaratnam – a veteran horse trainer. Jebel Ali Racecourse is known for hosting some of the thrilling racing events in the UAE. The racecourse has a seating area for over 2000 people and various food stalls to facilitate the spectators.

about-:
District 15 in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) is developed by Nakheel. Located near Al Khail Road, it features both villas and apartment buildings.
The master community of JVC is divided into 10 districts, which are numbered from 10 to 19. District 15 is also a part of the master development with all properties sharing the same layout. This area is especially ideal for families since there are numerous leisure amenities. Easy access to public transportation and several reputable schools in the vicinity makes it a desirable option for many expats.
in-a-nutshell:
Developed by Nakheel
Part of JVC
Features villas, townhouses and apartments
Packed with various urban amenities
Direct access to Al Khail Road
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
District 15 is located in the heart of JVC and has several amenities for residents. Popular points of interest in the community are:
Parks, jogging tracks
Lush green gardens
Proximity to schools, shopping malls and fitness centres
One can spot parks and jogging tracks, popular supermarkets and entertainment spots in the community. Properties in the district are available for rent and sale. The calm ambience is complemented by lush gardens. Though the neighbourhood is tucked away from the bustling metropolis, schools, malls and fitness centres aren’t far away. In fact, District 15 is quite close to Dubai Marina and JLT.
properties-in:
Residential apartments in District 15 JVC
Properties in District 15 consist of apartments and villas. Apartments are available as studios to 2-bedroom units.
The covered areas for studio units range from 410 sq. ft. to 550 sq. ft. These units have a fitted bathroom, a semi-open kitchen with built-in cabinets and a cosy balcony offering community views.
1-bedroom apartments have covered areas of about 700 sq. ft. These units have a semi-open kitchen with fitted cabinets and high-end finishing and a comfy living area with floor-to-ceiling glass windows.
The spacious 2-bedroom apartments have covered areas of 1,100 sq. ft. These units have two master bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a living area with floor-to-ceiling windows, a kitchen with fitted cabinets and a spacious balcony.
Villas in District 15 come in two configurations: 3-bedroom and 4-bedroom. The covered areas for these homes range from 2,100 sq. ft. to 3,500 sq. ft. One can find a closed-style kitchen in these villas.
Spacious villas in District 15 JVC

Transportation and Parking Spaces in District 15
There is plenty of parking in District 15. Apartment buildings have designated areas while villa owners get a parking garage.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN DISTRICT 15
There is a well-developed public transport system in District 15. The nearest bus stops are Mirabella Villas 2 and Mirabella Villas 6. The Atlantis S 1 bus stop is just 4 minutes away. The nearest metro station is the First Abu Dhabi Bank Metro Station.
First Abu Dhabi Bank Metro Station is the nearest station
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
SUPERMARKETS IN DISTRICT 15
There are some of the prominent retail chains near the community. Greens Supermarket in District 15 is the most popular one at a 2-minute drive away. Blue Mart Fresh is also located at a walking distance.
Greens Mini Mart in District 15 JVC
Aswaaq Mart is relatively a bigger retail chain with basic household and grocery products. Residents can also find Spinneys and West Zone Fresh near District 15.
MOSQUES IN DISTRICT 15
There are plenty of mosques in District 15 and its neighbouring areas. JVC Masjid is just 5 minutes away. Other mosques in the vicinity are Abu Bakr Al Siddique Mosque, Ahmed Al Ghait Masjid and Khalfan Bin Shanaf Mosqueat an 8-minute drive away.
other-places-of-worship:
The nearest church is Casa de Oracion on Al Khail Street. It is only 9 minutes away. Other churches near District 15 are Old Apostolic Church, Coza Church Dubai and Seventh Day Adventist Church. All these are located near Barsha Heights at a 12-minute drive away.
Gurunanak Darbar Sikh Gurudwara is a 15-minute drive away.
SCHOOLS AND UNIVERSITIES IN DISTRICT 15
Most schools near District 15 are located near Al Khail Road. Top choices include:
JSS International School
Nord Anglia International School Dubai
American School of Creative Science Al Barsha
JSS International School follows the CBSE curriculum. Another popular school, Global Indian International School Dubai, is located in the vicinity. It incorporates a dual curriculum system. For basic education, CBSE curriculum is offered while secondary level students can opt for IBDP (International Baccalaureate Diploma Program).
There are two reputable nurseries near District 15: Stepping Stones and Kids World Nursery JVC.
Stepping Stones Academy

Popular restaurants near District 15 are:
Subwich
Defne Turkish Restaurant
Desert Wok Restaurant

Marmarita Restaurant is another popular place in the vicinity serving a wide variety of Syrian specialities. For Lebanese food, one can head to Lokmat Baladna, which is a 6-minute drive away.
For a quick bite, one can visit Al Karya Bakery, Sweet Retreat and Little Berry. Al Karya Bakery offers a dining facility along with home delivery services. People can fulfil their ice cream cravings at Sweet Retreat.
beaches-near:

The community is known for its green landscaped areas and numerous community parks. One can enjoy jogging or cycling here. Plus, you can relax as kids have fun running around in the playgrounds. Some popular parks in the area are Halfa Park, JVC Castle Park and Circle Community Park.
District 15 JVC, Community Park
One can keep fit at InstaBody Gym at FIVE Jumeirah Village, which is a 5-minute drive away. Fitness 101, also located in JVC, is a 6-minute drive away from the district.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
There is no doubt that the community has various lifestyle facilities, well-developed infrastructure and easy access to major roads. However, one has to keep in mind that some parts of the community are still under construction and the noise can cause minor inconveniences.

about-: Garden Lane Villas is a residential development in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), a project of Nakheel Developers. The villas are organized in a row, in an excellent layout featuring open green spaces and set in a peaceful environment. Located alongside Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) and Al Khail Road (E44), the community has direct access to a host of amenities, including schools, clinics, supermarkets, mosques and community centres.
in-a-nutshell:
Residential sub-community in District 15 of Jumeirah Village Circle
Neatly lined townhouses surrounded by green belts 
Featuring luxurious family homes for rent
Villas comprise 2 floors and 4-bedrooms
Direct access to Al Khail Road (E44)
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Being a part of Jumeirah Village Circle, the sub-community sure has its benefits. Highlights of the area include:
Private outdoor area
Communal garden
Water features
Play area for children
Garden Lane Villas boast a peaceful and eco-friendly atmosphere. Private green spaces are accommodated in each villa that is neatly lined in a row in a village setting. Families can also enjoy landscaped parks in the parent community that include paved jogging tracks.
PROPERTIES IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Properties in Garden Lane Villas consist of 4-bedroom townhouses in a standard size of about 3,300 sq. ft. The attached villas have 2 floors along with a rooftop terrace. The ground floor features a master bedroom, a spacious hallway, a furnished kitchen and a staircase leading up to the above floors. The second compartment features bedrooms with walk-in closets and a living area. The rooftop has a small area that can be used as storage or extra room.
Tranquil community vibes in Garden Lane Villas
