transportation-and-parking-spaces:
Finding parking spaces in Garden Lane Villas is hassle-free for residents. Each villa unit has a dedicated car garage or porch. Visitors can also park vehicles out on the street for a limited hour.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Residents depending on public transport can catch buses from the JVC Samer Park bus stop, JVC Sandoval Lane Apartments 1 bus stop and JVC Season Community Autumn bus stop. All of these are located at a maximum of 10-minute walking distance. Hailing cabs is another option for transportation near Garden Lane Villas.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
SUPERMARKETS IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Fulfilling the regular grocery needs of residents, there are many supermarkets near Garden Lane Villas. The closest is Greens Supermarket, which is within a 3-minute walking distance. Aswaaq Mart is a 9-minute walk while Spinneys is a 6-minute drive from the area. There is West Zone Fresh Supermarket at a 6-minute drive that serves British goods.
MOSQUES IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
A grand mosque is at the centre of the master community, Saleh Muhammad Bin Lahej Mosque, which will be only 5-minutes from the area. Meanwhile, residents can visit a local mosque near Garden Lane Villas, 6-minutes away.
Saleh Bin Lahej Mosque in JVC is located within a walking distance
other-places-of-worship:
The Winning Generation Gospel Assembly is the closest church near Garden Lane Villas, located 10-minutes away. Residents can also visit City Hill Church Dubai and Emirates Baptist Church International (EBCI), located 13 to 18-minutes of drive from the area, respectively.
To facilitate Hindus living in the area, there is a Hindu Temple in Jebel Ali at a drive of about 18-minutes. The Sikh community can go to a gurdwara called, Guru Nanak Darbar in Jebel Ali Village. Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple is located in Al Garhoud to cater to the religious obligations of Buddhists.
SCHOOLS IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Parents have quite a few educational options in the community for enrolling their children, including plenty of nurseries and daycare centres. Some nurseries nearby are:
Kids World Nursery JVC
Chubby Cheeks Nursery
Jumeirah International Nursery
Schools near Garden Lane Villas include:
American School of Creative Science
JSS International School
Global Indian International School
JSSIS provides one of the leading curriculums (ICSE)
Ideally located within the community, JSS International School is among the top Indian Schools in Dubai, offering an ICSE curriculum to students. The co-education school has an affordable fee structure and nurtures children from kindergarten to grade 12, providing them with transport services. The school also has a lecture hall, an IT lab, a library, a project room, an auditorium and a counselling centre. It is located at a distance of 5-minutes from the area.
American School of Creative Sciences in the Al Barsha Community is a 10-minute drive. Global Indian International School also covers the same distance, located on Hessa Street (D61). Its strict curriculum prepares students to be productive, inquisitive and successful.
Students have quite a few options for notable universities close to the area. Located at about a 15-minute drive, there is American University in Dubai, a private educational facility that provides graduate and undergraduate programs.
CLINICS AND HOSPITALS IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Health facilities that are located near the community are:
Mediclinic
Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Centre
American Hospital Clinic
Clinics near Garden Lane Villas include multiple branches of Mediclinic located close by. One is in Al Barsha South at a 14-minute drive and the other is in Meadows 17-minutes away. American Hospital Clinic is also located in Al Barsha and Dubai Media City both 12-minutes away from the area.
Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Centre is a 15-minute of drive, and one of the best hospitals in Dubai. It specialises in various fields including Cardiology, Nephrology, Pulmonology and Dermatology. Patients are catered to using the best technology and advanced treatment methods, by professionally sound doctors.
nearby-areas:
The community has easy access via Al Khail Road (E44) and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311). Enjoying the amenities of nearby areas, it is situated in the neighbourhood of:
Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT)
Al Barsha
Al Barsha South
Dubai Sports City
Springs 7
Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) is the neighbouring community, connected via highways, it is located on the western side of JVC. Dubai Sports City covers the southern side of the locality. Al Barsha and Al Barsha South are situated towards the northeastern side. Springs 7 is at the northwestern end of Jumeirah Village Circle.
local_cafe
LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
MALLS IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
A few malls are located close to the area while some are located in nearby communities. A few notable malls near Garden Lane Villas include:
Circle Mall
City Centre Me’aisem
The Springs Souk 
Nakheel Mall
Circle Mall is a cutting-edge lifestyle meets food retail space
Nakheel Mall features around 350 retail stores and boasts popular fashion brands like:
Boots
Outfitters
Mothercare
Debenhams
Besides shopping, visitors can also enjoy the multiscreen cinema and a good number of dining venues. Located at a distance of 19-minutes, the mall has a Waitrose supermarket and multi-storey parking spaces. City Center Me’aisem is a one-storey mall but offers many popular high-end brands like H&M, Also, Claire’s and Max. It is closer to the area, at 16-minutes of a drive.
Circle Mall is a development of Nakheel Groups, one of the finest shopping and leisure destinations for visitors. Visitors can enjoy a multi-screen cinema, along with several dining options and Spinneys in the mall. Circle Mall is located just 7-minutes away.
RESTAURANTS IN GARDEN LANE VILLAS
Some popular restaurants near Garden Lane Villas include:
PINZA Pizza
Socialicious Restaurant – House of Asian Blends
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
Bawarchi Indian Restaurant
Pide Keyfi ( Turkish Bite )
Sticky Rice
PINZA Pizza, Pide Keyfi and Sticky Rice are the most popular restaurants in JVC. These trendy restaurants compliment the peaceful ambience, of the community perfectly. Pide Keyfi serves traditional Middle Eastern and Turkish cuisines, including Turkish Pizza (AKA Pide) and Cheese Kunafa, located just 4-minutes away from the area.
Louisiana-inspired fast-food chain known for its spicy fried chicken, biscuits & sides
The pleasant and warm interior of Socialicious Restaurant provides a perfect ambience to visitors. The restaurant serves Asian cuisine inspired by South-Asian dishes. Located at a driving distance of 6-minutes, it also serves calamari, ramen and nachos. PINZA Pizza serves all sorts of pizzas while Sticky Rice serves the best of Oriental food. All these restaurants are located at a maximum drive of 10-minutes.
beaches-near: Beaches near Garden Lane Villas are located at a 15 to 20-minute of driving distance. The coastal area of Dubai has many beaches including Jumeirah Beach, Marina Beach, Kite Beach, Adventure Beach and a few more. Amwaj Rotana located approximately 20-minutes from the area has a large swimming pool, where residents can enjoy a good swim.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Leisure activities near Garden Lane Villas include:
The Els Golf Club
Dubai Miracle Garden
Reel Cinemas
Dubai Miracle Garden, a family-favourite place to hang out
Reel Cinema is a 20-minute drive for residents of JVC, featuring 6 screens and double reclining seats. The cinema shows the latest released movies, with an option of easy electronic booking and friendly service. Els Golf Club, give its visitors an excellent golfing experience along with top-notch services. It is a 12-minute drive via Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311).
Dubai Miracle Garden is one of the most vibrant places in the UAE, with millions of colourful flowers and thousands of butterflies, it is located just 11-minutes from JVC. The popular landmark in Dubailand is also home to the largest butterfly garden in the world, Dubai Butterfly Park, where clusters of 26 species of butterflies serve as a pleasant spectacle for visitors.
OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES, FITNESS AND BEAUTY
Residents can avail of these outdoor activities in the community:
Several community parks
Paved walkways
Basketball court
Swimming pool
For routine fitness and health check-ins, residents can join some notable gyms near Garden Lane Villas, including Fitness 101 and New Life Fitness Gym. Both are located at a 5-minute drive. Prime Fitness JVC is 6 minutes away, located just off Al Khail Road (E44).
Some spas and salons near Garden Lane Villas include:
Beauty Trend Salon
Aura Beauty Salon
Elle et Il Ladies Saloon
Beauty Trend Ladies Salon offers top-notch services that receive 5-star reviews. Residents can reach here in 7-minutes of a drive. Elle et Il Ladies Saloon, also covers the same distance, providing professional services with organic and vegan-friendly products. Aura Beauty Salon is the closest, located just 5-minutes away from the area.
community-events: There was a community event held in the master community by the name of ‘JVC Community Event’. Visitors of neighbouring communities were welcomed with a free ticket. The event featured kids-friendly activities like bouncing castle, face-painting and treasure hunting.
social-community-groups:
Residents can join a well-established group on Facebook, by the name of Jumeirah Village Circle – Residents so that exchanging communication and sharing is easier. There is also a public group by the name of Jumeirah Village, which residents of both JVC and JVT can join for a broader interaction.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
JVC is a popular and family-friendly community, with large affordable living spaces. However, residents can still find a lack of metro stations close by and will have to manage public transportation issues by travelling via buses.

about-:
Marina Wharf is a complex of twin towers in Dubai Marina. Both the towers consist of 29 floors above ground, with an estimated height of 118.89 metres. The project was launched in 2006 by Dheeraj Group & East Coast LLC and was completed in 2010. Designed by Dimensions Engineering Consultants, its exterior is made of two colours including blue and grey. Both the towers feature floor-to-ceiling windows, displaying the glistening views of the neighbourhood and the marina.
Marina Wharf is a high-rise complex with twin towers
The complex includes 146 residential units in total which are available in 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartment configurations. Apart from a gym and a swimming pool, it contains many other sports facilities including a squash court, billiards room and six-lane bowling alley. There are barbecue areas and podium gardens along with jogging tracks on the ground and podium levels of the complex. Marina Wharf has easy access to restaurants, supermarkets and many other attractions such as Skydive Dubai and JBR Beach.
Dubai Marina is one of the most popular residential localities in Dubai. Home to many high-rise towers, the area has a family-friendly outlook with a vibrant urban environment. The facilities in the neighbourhood include shops, restaurants, supermarkets, malls and more.
in-a-nutshell:
Type of building: Residential
Location: Dubai Marina
Developer: Dheeraj Group & East Coast LLC
Number of floors: 29
Number of units:  146
Unit type: 1, 2 and 3 bed apartments
Amenities: gym, swimming pool, squash court
business
BUILDING DETAILS
Facilities in Marina Wharf
PARKING
Residents of Marina Wharf, Dubai receive allocated parking spaces in the building. Marina Wharf does not offer guest parking, visitors may use the paid parking spaces outside.
ELEVATORS
Both the towers in the Marina Wharf complex feature multiple high-speed elevators.
SECURITY, CENTRAL AIR-CONDITIONING AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES 
The complex offers 24-hour security and maintenance services, with CCTV cameras monitoring the building premises. District cooling for the building is provided by Empower.
EVENT SPACE
Residents can use the barbecue areas and landscaped gardens in the community to arrange events.
GYM AND FITNESS FACILITIES 
The building exhibits fitness facilities including a gym, swimming pool and steam/sauna facilities. There is also a podium garden with jogging tracks.
LIFESTYLE AMENITIES
N Dot K Beauty Lounge is located on the ground floor of Marina Wharf, Dubai
Lifestyle amenities in Marina Wharf include a squash court, billiards room and six-lane bowling alley. There is also a designated play area for children, located on the ground floor of the complex.
There are retail shops in the complex including a restaurant and a beauty lounge.
CONCIERGE AND GUEST SERVICES 
Both towers have grand lobbies that feature a front-desk with 24-hour guest services, comfortable sitting areas and intercom facilities.
PET-FRIENDLY
Marina Wharf, like many other residential buildings in the area, is a pet-friendly building complex.
Safety Features
Safety features in the tower include fire alarms, smoke detectors and fire extinguishers.

Apartment Types in Marina Wharf
Marina Wharf, Dubai Marina offers 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments in different layouts and configurations.
1-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA WHARF 
1-bedroom apartments in Marina Wharf consist of built-up areas ranging from 780 sq. ft. to 819 sq. ft. Each 1 BHK flat features a living and dining area with a bedroom, an en-suite bathroom, a powder room and a pantry. The terrace is large and views the scenic water.
2-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA WHARF
The coverage areas for 2-bedroom units ranges between 1,181 sq. ft. and 1,430 sq. ft. All the 2-bedroom units contain two en-suite bathrooms, open or closed kitchens and wide balconies. Some of the flats contain additional maid’s rooms that come with separate bathrooms.
3-BEDROOM APARTMENTS IN MARINA WHARF
3 BHK flats in Marina Wharf spans over an area from 1,287 sq. ft. to 1,944 sq. ft. These units are massive with multiple balconies. Apart from typical features like three bedrooms and three bathrooms, there are maid’s rooms, dressing rooms and guest bathrooms in many units. The kitchens are open or closed plans depending on the configuration type.

NEARBY AMENITIES
Transportation near Marina Wharf 
Public transportation near Marina Wharf include buses, metro and tram services.
BUS STATIONS NEAR MARINA WHARF
Jumeirah Beach Residence 2 Bus station and Marsa Dubai, Jumeirah Beach Residence Station 1 are at a walking distance of 5 to 10-minute. Also, JLT Business Centre and JLT, Dubai Arch Tower are accessible within 10-minute drive, by car.
METRO STATIONS NEAR MARINA WHARF
Those who rely on Dubai Metro, Sobha Realty Metro Station and DMCC Metro station 1 is just 7-minute drive from Marina Wharf, Dubai. Ibn Battuta and Jebel Ali Metro station are 8 and 9-minute drive away.
TRAM STATIONS NEAR MARINA WHARF
Trams stations around Marina Wharf are also a convenient option for travelling across the city. Jumeirah Beach Residence Tram Station 2 is just a minute walk from Marina Wharf. Jumeirah Beach Residence 1 Tram station and Dubai Marina Mall Tram station are other two options available at 4 and 5-minute driving distance.
Restaurants near Marina Wharf

Apart from Memory Lane Restaurants which is housed in Marina Wharf, other nearby restaurants include:
Flavor Land Restaurant
The Cheesecake factory
IKCON Restaurant
Grill & Chill Restaurant
Mama Zonia
Toro Toro
All these restaurants are accessible within 10 to 15 minutes from Marina Wharf. Flavor Land Restaurant is in Dubai Marina and serves Indian, Fast Food, Grilled food, Mandi and Russian food. It is housed in Marina Diamond Building 3 and has both indoor and outdoor seating options. The Cheesecake factory has American desserts and salads and has Wi-Fi, indoor seating facilities and delivery available.
Toro Toro is one of the best fine dining restaurants in Dubai Marina. It is housed in Grosvenor House and is known for its brunches. Mama Zonia is in Pier 7 and serves Asian, Caribbean and Latin American cuisines. Other restaurants in Pier 7 include Asia Asia, Cargo, The Scene and Atelier M.

Delphine Tower

Attessa Tower
ARY Marine Views

things-to-consider:

about-: The residential development of Indigo Ville by Indigo Group is scattered in different districts of Jumeirah Village Circle. The townhouse community features eight sub-communities in total. Indigo Ville JVC features Mediterranean styled townhouses in 3 and 4-bed configurations. Indigo Ville 5 located in District 14, JVC is one of the eight sub-communities. The construction of the project started in 2007 and was completed by 2015.

The townhouses have four master bedrooms with balconies, en-suite bathrooms and built-in wardrobes. You can also find a well-equipped closed kitchen, a large living area, a maid’s room with an attached bathroom, a guest bathroom, a spacious garden and parking spaces. There is a large terrace on the first floor, while the rooftop terrace can be used for BBQ parties.

The community is divided into Summer and Autumn clusters featuring a mix of apartments and townhouses. Moreover, the project has shades of both, modern architecture and traditional lifestyle. about-: Located along Al Khail Road, La Riviera Estates is a residential sub-community in District 10 of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), Dubai. The project was launched in 2008 by B&M FZCO and delivered in 2014. La Riviera Estates features townhouses, villas and two low-rise apartment buildings.

Canals

Not to mention, the sub-community is located close to Dubai Marina and Jumeirah Lakes Towers (JLT), places known for their leisure options. Overall, La Riviera Estates is a family-friendly sub-community is one of the most popular locations in Dubai.
properties-in:
Properties in La Riviera Estates JVC include two apartment buildings and 26 villas and townhouses. These provide a variety of living spaces ideal for professionals, couples and families alike.
Covered areas for 1-bedroom flats range from approximately 600 to 900 sq. ft. These include one-bedroom and a bathroom. There may be a guest washroom in some units as well. Moving on, 2-bedroom units are obviously more spacious, with covered areas going up to 1,350 sq. ft. These comprise two bedrooms and bathrooms, plus a guest bathroom in some units.
In terms of facilities, residents get balcony and terrace access, along with a common gym and swimming pool, as well as 24/7 security.
Apart from apartment buildings, one can also opt for 4-bedroom villas and townhouses in the sub-community. These have an average covered area of 4,000 sq. ft.
These homes include four bedrooms, up to six bathrooms and a maid’s room. There’s a spacious living area as well. Finally, the outdoor space comprises a private garden and covered parking. In addition, residents also get rooftop access.

transportation-and-parking-spaces:
When it comes to public transportation in La Riviera Estates, options for residents include bus and taxi services. While there is no metro station in JVC as yet (though this will change soon), one can take a bus ride to reach the Mall of Emirates Metro Station.
Moreover, finding parking spaces in La Riviera Estates is not an issue. Townhouses, villas and apartment buildings offer parking spaces to residents. On the other hand, one can also find public parking spaces near the community spaces.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near: Major amenities are within easy access of the sub-community. These include supermarkets near La Riviera Estates such as All Day Supermarket, Choithrams and Spinneys. All these supermarkets are located in JVC and are more than sufficient for the daily shopping needs of the community.
mosques-near: Moving on, there are a couple of mosques near La Riviera Estates dotted across the community. These include Masjid JVC and Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque.
other-places-of-worship:
Among worship place of various faiths, there are a couple of churches near La Riviera Estates within a 15-minute distance by car. These include Seventh Day Church, Fellowship Church and Emirates Baptist Church.
With regards to temples near La Riviera Estates, one can find a Sikh gurudwara (Gurunanak Darbar) 16 minutes away in the Jebel Ali. There is also a Buddist temple nearby by the name of Mahamevnawa. Finally, Hindu temples are located 30 minutes away in Bur Dubai.
schools-near:
One of the many reasons JVC is considered a family-friendly community is the presence of good educational options in the vicinity. Schools near La Riviera Estates include:
JSS International School
Sunmarke Schools
Nord Anglia International School
JSS International School is one of the highlights of the community. This school was launched in 2017 and offers the Indian curriculum until Year 12. On the other hand, Sunmarke School and the Nord Anglia International School, both offer the UK curriculum.
In addition, younger children can attend nurseries near La Riviera Estates, such as:
Kids World Nursery
Ladybird Early Learning Centre
Jumeirah International Nursery
Finally, universities near La Riviera Estates include The British University Dubai, University of Wollongong Dubai and Herriot Watt Dubai. These are located in Dubai Knowledge Park, located about 15 minutes away from the community.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Along with the amenities listed above, there are also a couple of clinics and hospitals near La Riviera Estates. These include:
Karama Medical Center
Emirates Hospital Day Surgery
Mediclinic Park View Hospital
Karama Medical Center located within JVC is sufficient for most healthcare needs. You can, however, head to Emirates Hospital and Mediclinic Park View Hospital for specialty services. Both these hospitals are located just 15 minutes away from the neighbourhood.
In addition, there are several pharmacies all over the community, Health First Pharmacy9 being closest to the sub-community.
nearby-areas:
Among residential communities in the emirate, those closest to La Riviera Estates include:
Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT)
Dubai Marina
The Springs community
Other nearby areas include JLT, Sports City and JBR, areas known for their leisure options. As you can see, the sub-community is connected to several major areas of Dubai.
local_cafe
LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
malls-near:
For those who love to shop, there are a couple of small and large shopping malls near La Riviera Estates JVC. These include:
Circle Mall
The Springs Souk
City Centre Me’aisem
Circle Mall is the nearest mall from the community. It is home to over 200 stores, several restaurants including a lounge bar on the ground floor, a multi-screen cinema, a Spinney’s supermarket and a children’s play area.
A street view of Circle Mall
City Centre Me’aisem is a popular shopping destination serving the residents of JVC and JVT. For shopping, there are high street fashion outlets, home and electronics stores, health & beauty stores. Some of the renowned brand stores and shops are:
Centrepoint
H&M
Bath & Body Works
Max
HiPhone
Tavola
M.A.C
The Body Shop
An outlet of Centrepoint in City Centre Me’aisem
Amenities of City Centre Me’aisem include a Carrefour hypermarket, Boots Pharmacy, Super Care Pharmacy, restaurants and recreational options.
restaurants-near:
If you are a foodie at heart, La Riviera Estate JVC Dubai is an ideal place to call home. It is close to popular restaurant in JVC where you can indulge in delicious cuisine. These include:
Deccan Delight Restaurant Dubai
The Kitchen Station Restaurant
Like View Restaurant
Bawarchi Indian Restaurant JVC
Secret Spice Restaurant
Socialicious Restaurant 
Village Bistro
Defne Turkish Restaurant
Deniro Dubai
Lokmat Baladna
Coop Restaurant
Marmarita Restaurant
Jeita Restaurant
Desert Wok Restaurant JVC
Trattoria by Cinque
Salt and Chillis Restaurant
One can also enjoy the exciting nightlife by sampling some of the best bars and nightclubs in Dubai. These include The Social Pool by Soul Street, Goose Island Tap House and The Mansion. These are just 5-minute drive from La Riviera Estate JVC.
beaches-near:
For those who love splashing waves and walking on the sand, there are several beaches near La Riviera Estates JVC within a 20-minute distance. These include JBR Beach and Kite Beach, which offer a host of activities for you to enjoy. These include waterboarding, jet skiing, scuba diving, kayaking and sailing.
Kite Beach offers visitors everything from water sport activities to sun lounges and pristine sand
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Along with shopping and dining, the community offers several avenues for leisure activities for the residents. Some popular entertainment spots near La Riviera Estates JVC Dubai include:
Balloon Adventures Dubai
Dubai Miracle Garden
Dubai Butterfly Garden
The Dubai Autodrome
Balloon Adventures Dubai offer some of the top hot air balloon rides in Dubai. Floating at 4,000 ft., you can overlook the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve which have wild life. You can also experience a short camel ride in the desert, in-flight falcon show, desert drive in vintage Land Rovers and gourmet a la carte breakfast.
Dubai Miracle Garden is one of the popular leisure places located in the heart of Dubailand. One can witness over fifty million flowers of 120 varieties. The venue also features a cafe, sweet bar, restaurant, bazaar, a photo booth, kiosk and souvenir shop.
Floral Clock in Dubai Miracle Garden
Dubai Butterfly Garden is located right next to the Miracle Garden. This recreational facility is home to over 15,000 butterflies belonging to 50 species.
Dubai Butterfly Garden
Dubai Autodrome is a renowned motorsport facility in Motor City that features a 5.39 km circuit with six different configurations. One can also find indoor and outdoor karting tracks, the Grandstand Retail Plaza, the Motorsport Business Park, a racing school and other recreational facilities. It is accessible within 14-minute drive by car.
Dubai Autodrome in Motor City
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
When it comes to outdoor activities, the community offers incomparable facilities. There are more than 30 landscaped parks in the vicinity where one can enjoy strolling and jogging while taking their children as well as pets to play.
Other facilities include bicycle paths and community pools, all designed to keep residents active. In addition, the nearby Sports City offers facilities for soccer, basketball, and kickboxing.
Gyms near La Riviera Estates JVC Dubai include:
Al Amir Gym
InstaBody Gym 
Prime Fitness JVC
Al Amir Gym is at a 5-minute drive by car. InstaBody Gym is located at FIVE Jumeirah Village, at a 6-minute drive by car. One of the best fitness centres and gyms in JVC, Prime Fitness provides state-of-the-art equipment and talented personal trainers who can help you meet your fitness goals. It is reachable at a 5-minute drive by car.
Likewise, salons near the sub-community include:
Elle Et Il Ladies Saloon
BerryCut Beauty Salon
Tabassom Ladies Salon
Noona Beauty Salon
Al Bariq Ladies Salon
These are some of the popular spas and beauty salons in JVC where you can get pampered. In addition, there are few barber shops for gents such as Barbers Gents Salon, Grooming House and Dimassi Gents Salon among others. These can be reached within 5-minute drive by car.
community-events: Community events include public celebrations on occasions like National Day. In addition, residents can head to neighbouring communities to engage in other events.
social-community-groups: Residents can stay connected through a couple of Facebook groups: ‘_Jumeirah Village Circle Community_’, ‘_Jumeirah Village Circle, Jumeirah Village Circle – Residents_’ and ‘_Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) Pet Owners_’.
things-to-consider:
La Riviera Estate JVC offers a variety of residential spaces with modern amenities within easy reach. The presence of Circle Mall within JVC offer numerous options for dining, shopping and recreation. Those who commute on their cars will find travel to and from the sub-community convenient, except during peak hours in the daytime and evening.
FAQS ABOUT LA RIVIERA ESTATES JVC
WHERE IS LA RIVIERA ESTATES?
La Riviera Estates is a residential development in District 10, Jumeirah Village Circle.
WHAT TYPE OF PROPERTIES ARE AVAILABLE IN LA RIVIERA ESTATES JVC?
The residential development feature 26 villas and 185 apartments in two five-storey blocks.
HOW TO GET TO LA RIVIERA ESTATES JVC DUBAI BY BUS?
The bus route J01 pass through the bus stops near La Riviera Estates JVC.

about-: Gallery Villas is an exclusive residential development in Dubai Sports City. It lies close to Al Khail Road and Hessa Street. The project comprises a collection of 10 villas and 40 townhouses with views of the Els Club golf course. Residents can choose from 4-bedroom townhouses and 5 bedroom villas. Each unit is designed exclusively to match your preferences.
in-a-nutshell:
A small residential community in Dubai Sports City
40 townhouses and 10- stand-alone villas
Proximity to The Els Club
Friendly community environment
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Gallery Villas is a small enclave developed within Dubai Sports City. Dotted on the periphery of the community, it can be accessed via Al Fay Road. The properties in Gallery Villas offer views of The Els Club from a short distance. The district was launched in 2007 and the handing over of properties began in 2014. The project is built by Dubai Sports City itself.
Some highlights of Gallery Villas are:
High-end villas and townhouses
Family-friendly community
Proximity to Mohammed Bin Zayed Road
Overall, the neighbourhood is secure and provides an ideal living environment for residents.
properties-in:
Gallery Villas boasts properties built on Spanish-Andalusian theme. Villa and townhouses have an expansive private backyard, spacious balconies and patios. The well-planned district has ten villas comprising 5-bedroom units and forty 4-bedroom townhouses.
The 3-bedroom townhouse in Gallery Villas covers almost 2,147 to 2,444 sq. ft. It has 3 spacious bedrooms with attached bathrooms. The living room has a double-glazed glass sliding door that connects it with the balcony. The open kitchen has fitted cabinets and a granite countertop. All the bedrooms and the maid’s room are on the 1st floor. The townhouse also has a small garden on the backside. There is a covered car parking space for 2 cars.
Rent of a 3-bedroom townhouse is approximately AED 127k per year.
The sale price of a 3-bedroom townhouse varies from AED 1.8M to AED 2.1M.
RENTAL TRENDS IN GALLERY VILLAS DUBAI SPORTS CITY
A 3-bedroom villa occupies almost 2,146 to 2,443 sq. ft. of space. Some villas have three while some have four bathrooms. A large dining room and an open kitchen are on the ground floor. On the first floor, there is a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and two other bedrooms. There are a maid’s room and parking space for two cars. The villas also have a private swimming pool.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN GALLERY VILLAS
Visitors usually park outside the homes while residents of townhouses and villas get plenty of covered car parking spaces In Gallery Villas.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR GALLERY VILLAS
Residents will find it easy to commute via buses and taxis. As for public transportation in Gallery Villas, the nearest bus stop is Sports City, Golf Tower 1 at a 1-minute drive, serviced by bus F-34 and J-02. Within the short distance of 5 minutes, one can spot multiple other bus stops. The nearest metro station is First Abu Dhabi Bank metro station, 13 minutes away from Gallery Villas.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near: Residents will find a few supermarkets near Gallery Villas. The nearest one is West Zone Fresh Supermarket at a 5-minute drive. Around 6 minutes away are Carrefour City and Al Maya Supermarket. Some grocery options less than 10 minutes’ away are Jame Jam Supermarket, Spinneys, Blue Mart Supermarket and Blue Mart.
mosques-near: There are four mosques in Dubai Sports City within 5 minutes’ drive. The central Sports City Mosque is at a 4-minute drive. A mosque at Elite 1 Sports Residence and two other mosques near Gallery Villas are 5 minutes away.
other-places-of-worship:
Christian residents can find several churches at less than a 20-minute drive. Ibrahems Jesus Church, St. Mina Coptic Orthodox Church, United Christian Church of Dubai, Christ Church Jebel Ali, United Christian Church of Dubai and Dubai Evangelical Church Centre are 16 minutes away.
Shiva Temple, Shirdi Sai Baba Mandir, Shrinath Ji Temple, and Shree Krishna Haveli are half an hour away from Gallery Villas.
SCHOOLS NEAR GALLERY VILLAS
For early year education, parents get to choose from multiple preschools near Gallery Villas such as
IDEA Early Learning Centre (ELC)
The Wonder Years Nursery
Kinder Castle Nursery
Emirates British Nursery – Motor City
IDEA ELC is for kids from nine months to six years. The school follows a creative curriculum helping students in early learning stages. The school is within the premises of Gallery Villas. The Wonder Years Nursery is at a 5-minute drive. The nursery has an indoor play area, a medical clinic and a gym. Emirates British Nursery is in Motor City, at a 9-minute drive. It was founded in 2000 and has a fully equipped clinic.
Some primary and secondary schools near Gallery Villas include the likes of
Victory Heights Primary School
Nord Anglia International School Dubai
Victory Heights Primary School is at an 8-minute drive within Dubai Sports City. The school has a highly qualified teaching staff and follows the National Curriculum of England including Arabic and Spanish language. Nord Anglia International School Dubai is almost at the same distance and follows the English National Curriculum. Multiple languages such as Arabic, German, Spanish, Mandarin and French are taught in the school.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Some well-reputed tertiary care hospitals near Gallery Villas include
Medcare Medical Centre
Mediclinic Parkview Hospital
Burjeel Hospital for Advanced Surgery
Medcare Medical Centre is 11 minutes away. It is a premium healthcare division of Aster DM Healthcare, running across nine countries. Mediclinic Parkview Hospital opened in 2018. It is conveniently located in New Dubai close to the intersection of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road.
nearby-areas:
Some key areas close to Gallery Villas are
Motor City
Jumeirah Golf Estates
Jumeirah Village Circle
Motor City is part of the larger Dubailand development. It is a coveted residential community ideal for families. Jumeirah Golf Estates is built around Fire and Earth Golf Course and offers uniquely designed villas. Jumeirah Village Circle is towards the North of Gallery Villas.
local_cafe
LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
malls-near:
Residents can reach out to one of the malls near Gallery Villas for the wholesome shopping experience. Some frequently visited malls include the likes of
City Centre Me’aisem
Carrefour
My City Centre Al Barsha
City Centre, Me’aisem is 7 minutes away. One can find books, fashion accessories, jewellery, watches, electronics, and many other shops in the mall. One can spot a hypermart and a pharmacy in the mall as well. My City Centre Al Barsha is at a 12-minute drive. The mall spans over 5,000 square metres and boasts multiple retail stores, dining options and a Carrefour supermarket. There is plenty of parking space in the mall for visitors.
restaurants-near:
Food lovers can spot several restaurants near Gallery Villas that serve a variety of cuisines. Some nearest dining options are the following ones:
Pulcinella Restaurant
Momo Restaurant
The Kebab Shop
Nathalie’s
Reddy Roast
Jack’s Place
Pulcinella Restaurant run by chef Domenico and his wife Claudia serves authentic Italian food. The menu comprises a number of appetisers, soups, pasta, salads, and pizzas. Momo Restaurant is at a 5-minute drive. It is a pocket-friendly eatery with an average cost for two people of approximately AED 40. The menu has Indian, Chinese and Arabian food. The Kebab Shop is 7 minutes away. The restaurant serves authentic Turkish, Asian, and Middle Eastern food. The dishes are made with aromatic herbs and ground spices. Nathalie’s is a café and restaurant where one can have food and coffee in one place. The place was opened in 2012. Sandwiches, salads, juices, and coffee with other tempting food are part of the menu.
beaches-near: All the beaches of Dubai are nearly half an hour away. Some beaches near Gallery Villas include Jumeirah Beach which is 24 minutes away while Kite Beach is almost at the same distance. Marina Beach is the nearest, at an 18-minute drive. JBR Beach is 21 minutes away.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Some leisure spots and key landmarks near Gallery Villas include the following
Dubai International Stadium
Dubai Autodrome
Dubai Miracle Garden
Dubai International Stadium is dotted in Dubai Sports City. It is also known as Dubai Sports City Cricket Stadium. With a capacity of 25,000 spectators, the stadium has a special system of 350 floodlights. Dubai Autodrome is at a short distance from Gallery Villas. This fully integrated multipurpose motorsport and entertainment destination is in Motor City. Dubai Miracle Garden opens every year from November to May. It is based on a 72,000 square metre area and was launched on Valentine’s Day 2013. It features over 50 million flowers and 250 million plants arranged in different attractive structures.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
For those who prefer working out in the gym, there are a few options near Galler Villas such as
Victory Heights Community Gym
Fit Republik Fitness Centre
Fitness First
These are not more than 10 minutes away plus there is also a yoga centre named as Lotus Holistic Yoga Centre at a 4-minute drive near Trinity Pole Fitness Studio.
Some beauty salons at a short distance include the following ones
Caractere by Dani Salons
Sera Beauty Room
Al Midad Ladies Salon
A few men’s salons that can be reached with convenience are Riman Gents Salon, Evolve Gents Salon, Lvenus Star Gents Salon, Karizma Gents Salon and Blue Beach Gents Salon. These are 10 minutes away from Gallery Villas.
community-events: Halloween and Christmas are celebrated every year in Dubai Sports City. The Dome is an indoor multipurpose sports field that hosts events for football fans such as Oktoberfest.
social-community-groups: Those looking to keep in touch with other residents can join the Facebook group called Dubai Sports City Community.
things-to-consider:
Life in Gallery Villas is calm and peaceful. However, some parts of Dubai Sports City are under construction, so it can be a bit noisy for peace-loving residents. The sale price of the properties is also higher compared to sales trends in other areas.
Are you looking to buy or rent property in Gallery Villas?

about-: Bloomingdale is a residential development in Dubai Sports City. It is located near Al Fay Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, providing direct access to city’s most popular business districts and attractions. This project by Sol Properties Development and was completed by 2017. Bloomingdale Dubai Sports City include townhouses in 3 to 5-bedroom units available to rent and buy. These residencies are luxury units designed using a traditional Arabic style.
in-a-nutshell:
A residential development in Dubai Sports City
Developed by Sol Properties Development and SOL Properties LLC
Offers townhouses in 3 to 5-bedroom units
Proximity to Al Fay Road and Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Road
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Bloomingdale Dubai Sports City bordering Victory Heights, is a long strip comprising spacious townhouses. People living in Bloomingdale enjoy a quiet and calm lifestyle around the green spaces of Dubai Sports City.
Popular points of interest in Bloomingdale Dubai are:
Less-crowded
Proximity to community parks
High-end townhouses
Residents get a landscape view of green spaces and walking track right across the townhouses. The townhouses have a similar infrastructure and are based on contemporary design.
properties-in:
Bloomingdale Townhouses Dubai Sports City comes in 72 residential units in 3 to 5-bedroom configurations. The residencies have master bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms, built-in wardrobe, spacious living room and dining area and well designed kitchen. Elegant Italian appliances are used in these units such as built-in dishwashers, hoods, ovens, double fridges and washing machines. Other features of these houses include a maid’s room with bathroom, a guest room, powder room and spacious terrace. Each townhouse also has a private garden and dedicated parking space.
Houses in Bloomingdale Dubai Sports City are elegantly designed
Bloomingdale Villas Dubai Sports City comes in 5-bedroom units. The units have four bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and attached bathrooms. The master bedroom is connected to a large terrace while the other bedrooms have separate balconies. The semi-open kitchen is equipped with high-quality appliances and a breakfast bar. It also has floor-to-ceiling glass windows overlooking the garden. The villas also have a maid’s room with bathroom, a storage room, laundry area and parking spaces.

Dubai Sports City has a strong transportation network making it convenient for residents to commute to and from Bloomingdale. supermarkets-near: There are a few supermarkets near Bloomingdale where residents can go for their groceries. Dubai Marina remains as the most coveted residential area in Dubai (especially for expats) with many entertainment points. Speaking of which, Al Mesk Villas (previously known as Al Anbar Villas) are podium-level luxury homes in Al Mesk Tower – another residential building in Dubai Marina. Proximity to commercial hubs and direct access to the arterial road network make the city ideal for professionals as well as families. Moreover, Al Mesk Villas exist in one of the most sought-after places with all the modern facilities in a hand’s reach.
The project is a part of the First Six Towers Complex by Emaar Properties. It is near Dubai Marina Walk, about 6 minutes from Sheikh Zayed Road (E11), interchange number 5. With views of the lakes, resorts and skyscrapers, Al Mesk Villas offer the perfect blend of beach and city life.
in-a-nutshell:
Podium villas in Al Mesk Tower
Luxurious family homes
Beachfront, duplex and triplex units
Prestigious location in Dubai
Upscale urban properties for rent and sale
home

Besides, there are biking tracks and jogging trails around the tower, so kids and adults spend most of the evenings out. Also, the building has 24-hour concierge services and CCTV security.
properties-in:

AL MESK VILLAS FLOOR PLANS
There are seven different floorplans for Al Mesk Villas. Type A, B, C, E and G include 3-bedroom units while D and F are 4-bedroom luxurious villas. All of these are double storey units while type F villas are fairly different. These include two floors plus ground and open space on the top which they call as a rooftop terrace.
transportation-and-parking-spaces:
You will find managed parking spaces in Al Mesk Tower. Since the project is a work of Dubai’s leading property developer, all residents enjoy uninterrupted facilities. Similarly, Al Mesk Villa residents also get a dedicated parking spot within the complex. As the streets are very busy during the day, it won’t be that easy for visitors to find a public parking spot nearby. You’re likely to have some luck at RTA Parking Zone, which is 11 minutes away.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR AL MESK VILLAS
Most people prefer to use public transport to travel within or outside the community because Dubai Marina has a huge network and various means of transport. Similarly, finding public transportation near Al Mesk Tower is not an issue. There are 11 tram stations in the city and 3 of them are less than 5 minutes from Al Anbar Villas. Marina Towers Station is roughly at a 7-minute walking distance. Also, Sobha Realty Metro Station is accessible within 10 minutes. It will further take you towards Downtown, Business Bay and Deira.

supermarkets-near: There are many supermarkets near Al Mesk Villas. A local shop and Spinneys are just at the corner of the street. mosques-near: Many mosques near Al Mesk Villas are located at short intervals. First, most of the residents prefer the one within the complex. Moreover, Mohammad Bin Ahmed Al Mulla Mosque, Al Rahim Mosque and Tiffany Mosque are all less than 10 minutes away.

Getting a home in Dubai Marina is a dream come true for many because it is one of the most happening places in the Emirate. Al Anbar Villas is, however, priced above par compared to other properties. Not to forget, facilities are exceptional and these villas have a great value for money.

JVC is one of Nakheel’s best-known residential developments in the city. The neighbourhood is preferred for its affordable housing options, including apartments, townhouses and villas. Not to mention, the wide variety of communal amenities adds to its appeal.
in-a-nutshell:
Located in District 15, JVC
A row of 15 3 and 4-bedroom townhouses

Construction started in 2008 and was completed in 2012
Amenities include covered parking spaces and spacious terraces

Properties in Iris Park include 3 and 4-bed townhouses with spacious bedrooms, built-in wardrobes and en-suite bathrooms. Each unit comes with a beautiful living area, spacious attached terraces and a maid’s room. Other features include a dedicated parking area and a balcony.

Circle Mall in a newly developed mall in Jumeirah Village Circle

Dubai Miracle Garden is a popular tourist hub located approximately 15 minutes away by car and is the ultimate spot for taking stunning photos. The flower installations include the famous Emirates A380, The Hearts Passage and Smurfs Village.
Dubai Butterfly Garden is a recreational facility that houses around 15,000 butterflies of over 50 different types in temperature-controlled domes. A 14-minute drive from the townhouse cluster, it is a great attraction for those who are looking for some family entertainment.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
A community park near Iris Park
Residents can spot many communal amenities near the townhouse development such as a shared pool and gym. Fitness centres in proximity include Prime Fitness JVC, 5 minutes away, New Life Fitness Gym, 7 minutes away and The Warehouse Gym, 11 minutes away.
Better Beauty Salon is a short drive away from the community

Dial A Nail
BerryCut Beauty Salon
Better Beauty Salon
Dial A Nail offers a wide range of services, such as signature manicures, waxing and threading, bleaching and tinting, spray tanning, etc. It is a 4-minute drive away. BerryCut Beauty Salon is four minutes away, and Better Beauty Salon is a 5-minute drive away.
community-events: Nakheel (the master developer of JVC) hosts various events and fun activities throughout the year.
social-community-groups:
Residents can follow the JVC Residents, Dubai Facebook page to keep track of community updates. JVC Community – Jumeirah Village Circle Residents is another group that residents can join.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
JVC presently doesn’t have a dedicated metro station. Hence, who rely heavily on the Dubai Metro for their daily commutes might not be impressed with living in JVC, Iris Bay. The community, however, has excellent amenities, and it is recommended to own personal vehicles for a hassle-free commute.

The villas come with amenities such as HVAC systems, solar water heater, ceramic tiles and cable/satellite TV.

about-:
Situated in Dubai Marina, Bay Central Tower consists of three buildings. These three buildings are called Central, East and West towers. The Central and West towers are residential buildings whereas the East Tower or Intercontinental Dubai Marina is a five-star hotel. The Central Tower consists of 47 floors while the West and East Towers feature 39 floors. The Central and West Towers house a total of 747 units divided into studios and 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments.
Dubai Marina is a waterfront community with a unique lifestyle and modern amenities. The area is home to high-rise residential towers surrounded by many upscale retail outlets, restaurants and cafes.
in-a-nutshell:
Situated in Dubai Marina
Consist of two residential towers and one 5-star hotel tower
Central Tower and West Tower house a total of 747 residential apartments
Offers studios and 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments
24-hour security with CCTV monitoring and security staff
A fitness centre inside the apartment complex
Steam and sauna room for rest and relaxation
Consists of several high-speed elevators
Bus stations are at walking distance

There is a covered parking space for residents inside each Bay Central Tower, Dubai. However, visitors may use the paid parking option nearby.
ELEVATORS
There are several high-speed elevators in Bay Central Tower, Dubai.
SECURITY, CENTRAL AIR-CONDITIONING AND MAINTENANCE SERVICES 
The building is fully secured with 24-hour security with CCTV monitoring, intercom system and air conditioning facilities. DEWA supplies power for electricity and water.
EVENT SPACE
There is a designated BBQ area that can be used for events and gatherings.
GYM AND FITNESS FACILITIES 
The gym in Bay Central, Dubai Marina is accessible to all residents.
LIFESTYLE AMENITIES
Children can enjoy the play area
Bay Central Tower has several lifestyle amenities such as a children’s play area and a large swimming pool. Residents can also access enjoy facilities of Jacuzzi, sauna and steam rooms.
CONCIERGE AND GUEST SERVICES 
There is a high-end lobby in Bay Central Tower, Dubai. The front desk staff is available round the clock to assist residents and visitors with their queries.
PET-FRIENDLY
Pets are strictly not allowed in Bay Central Tower
Safety Features
There are fire extinguishers present on every floor of Bay Central Building, Dubai Marina.

NEARBY AMENITIES
Transportation near Bay Central, Dubai Marina 
Residents can find many bus stations within walking distance. However, metro and tram stations are accessible within 10-minute by car.
BUS STATIONS NEAR BAY CENTRAL, DUBAI MARINA 
At a short distance of a minute walk, there is Marsa Dubai, Jumeirah Beach Residence Bus Station. While Jumeirah Beach Residence Station 1 is located at a walking distance of 8-minute.
METRO STATIONS NEAR BAY CENTRAL, DUBAI MARINA 
DMCC Metro Station 1 is the closest with a 9-minute driving distance. Also, Ibn Batuta is accessible with 10-minute by car.
TRAM STATIONS NEAR BAY CENTRAL, DUBAI MARINA 
Jumeirah Beach Residence Tram Station is located at a minute driving distance. Marina Tower Tram Station is another option accessible within 6-minute by car.
supermarkets-near:
Zoom Supermarket is located in Bay Central, Dubai Marina
Supermarkets near Bay Central Include:
ZOOM Supermarket
Al Maya Supermarket
Spinneys supermarket
Waitrose Supermarket
ZOOM Supermarket is located in Bay Central, Dubai Marina and has all the daily essentials in store.
At a distance of 7-minutes, there is Al Maya Supermarket. This supermarket carries a variety of Filipino products, making it popular among the community. For those looking to buy premium groceries and FMCGs can look forward to Spinneys supermarket. It carries both imported and local grocery products. The Waitrose Supermarket is at a distance of the 4-minute drive. Here, British expats can find all their favourite items including pork products.
Nearby Buildings
Bay Central, Dubai Marina is surrounded by many residential buildings offering similar amenities
Princess Tower – Residential Building
Marina Diamond 1– Residential Building
Jam Tower Dubai Marina – Residential Building
The Jewels – Residential Building
Jam Marina Residence is located at a minute distance. Within a 4 and 6-minute drive, one can find Princess Tower and Marina Diamond 1. The Jewels is another nearby building situated at a 9-minute driving distance.
Major Landmarks
Dubai Marina Yacht Club is 4-minute away
Nearby landmarks include:
Dubai Marina Mall
Dubai Marina Yacht Club
Sky Dive Dubai
At a distance of a 3-minute drive, there is a Dubai Marina Mall. The mall has many retail stores, restaurants and the famous Carrefour Supermarket. At a distance of a 4-minute drive, there is Dubai Marina Yacht Club which is an ideal place to enjoy the nightlife with several restaurants, bars and clubs overlooking the marina. At a 7-minute drive, there is Sky Dive Dubai where one can experience multiple types of skydiving including tandem skydiving and gyrocopter flight.
restaurants-near:
La Cartina is situated in Bay Central, Dubai Marina
Nearby restaurants include:
La Carnita
Wokyo Noodle Bar
Mantoushe Restaurant
Automatic Restaurant & Grill
Bay Central houses a restaurant named La Cartina. The restaurant serves Mexican cuisine with Lamb Chops, Churros, Salads, Nachos and Shawarma. They also have Ladies Night every Monday.
There are several restaurants near Bay Central, Dubai Marina. At a 10-minute driving distance, there is Wokyo Noodle Bar where one can enjoy Asian Fusion Noodles in a variety of flavours. Also, Mantoushe Restaurant is popular for its Lebanese and Mediterranean food and is situated at a 10-minute drive. For those who can’t get enough of grilled meats, there is Automatic Restaurant & Grill just 4-minutes away. From chicken, beef and lamb, one can choose their favourite food from extensive menus.
The nearby fine dining options include:
Atelier M
Toro Toro
DRIFT Beach Dubai
Marina Social
At a 4-minute drive time, one can experience the finest dining experience at Atelier M, with French and Mediterranean cuisines. There is also an availability of full-bar and it is recommended to make a reservation before arriving here. For those looking to experience Latin food, there is Toro Toro. Situated in Grosvenor Houses, the restaurant serves beef tacos, crispy prawns and sweet potato fries. At an 11-minute drive, residents can reach DRIFT Beach Dubai to enjoy foods from the French and Mediterranian menu. Marina Social is one of the best restaurants in Dubai Marina, offering a wide variety of dishes to its customer. The eatery is just 1 minute away from Bay Centra.
things-to-consider: Bay Central offers luxurious apartments with modern facilities. The building is close to many bus stations and nearby amenities. However, residents may find traffic congestion during peak hours.

OVERVIEW PROJECT DETAILS
Location Dubai Investments Park (DIP)
Project type Off-plan
Property type Townhouses
Unit type 4-Bed
Developer Reportage Properties
Est. Handover Q1, 2026
Verdana is an elegant collection of contemporary townhouses in Dubai Investments Park (DIP). This off-plan project by Reportage Properties started in August 2022, expected to be completed in Q1 2026. Spanning 454,000 sq. ft., Verdana features 305 4-bedroom townhouses. These residences are top-notch in terms of construction, design and space. Verdana DIP is close to Expo City Dubai and is surrounded by parks, schools, retails and mosques.
Verdana townhouses in Dubai Investments Park. Source: Reportage Properties.
in-a-nutshell:
A new residential development in Dubai Investments Park
Located close to Yalayis Street/ Jebel Ali Al Hibab Road (D57)
305 units of 4-bedroom townhouses
Developed by Reportage Properties
Attractive and flexible payment plan options
apartment
PROPERTY
community-overview:
Homes in Verdana Dubai Investments Park are designed to resonate with the city’s spirit and blend in with the surrounding lifestyle. These townhouses are ideal for families seeking a convenient lifestyle within a resort-like community. Contemporary designs, an earth colour palette and wooden touches are some of the main features of these family homes in Verdana, Dubai Investments Park.
Verdana DIP Masterplan
The masterplan of Verdana townhouses. Source: Reportage Properties.
Verdana DIP has spacious townhouses along with an extensive range of communal facilities. Parks, schools, mosques and retail shops surround the neighbourhood, delivering a luxurious lifestyle. The development enjoys proximity to Dubai’s landmarks.
Popular points of interest in the project include:
Gated community with 24-hour security
Two adult swimming pools and two kids swimming pools
Kids’ play area and gymnasium
Landscaped areas and shaded seating area
Verdana is an environment-friendly community. Residents will find swimming pools for adults and children. Those who like to stay fit can head to the fully equipped gym to meet their fitness goals. As for outdoor facilities, there are shaded seating areas where families can sit and socialise. Parents can keep their little ones engaged in the dedicated play area.
Residents of Verdana can find two adult swimming pools. Source: Reportage Properties.
properties-in:
Verdana Dubai Investments Park features 305 luxurious townhouses in 4-bedroom configurations. Each unit spans 2,772 sq. ft. to 3,394 sq. ft. and has a total height of 13.60 metres.
The 4B Townhouse Type A has a ground floor, first floor, second floor and roof level. There is a front yard and a private garden on the ground floor. This floor has a spacious living room, kitchen, dining area and washroom. On the first floor are two master bedrooms with a dressing table, attached bathrooms and a living room. As you go towards the second floor, the townhouse has two more master bedrooms with attached bathrooms. There is a spacious balcony which allows ventilation. On the rooftop, there is a maid’s room with a bathroom and a terrace with sitting area.
Verdana townhouses with dedicated parking spaces. Source: Reportage Properties.
The 4B Townhouse Type B (Option 1 with elevator) has ground, first, second and roof floors. The ground level has a front yard with elevators that goes to the roof. This level also has a spacious living room, well-equipped kitchen, dining area and two washrooms. The backyard has a private garden with sitting area. The first floor of this residential unit has two master bedrooms with a dressing table, attached bathrooms and a spacious living room. The second level has two master bedrooms with dressing rooms, attached bathrooms and a spacious balcony that allows fresh air inside. The roof level of the house has a maid’s room with a bathroom and a spacious terrace.
The 4B Townhouse Type B (Option 2 with storage) has ground, first, second and rooftop. The ground level has a front yard. It also features a spacious living room, kitchen and dining area, two washrooms, storage area and a private garden in the backyard. The house’s first level has two master bedrooms with attached bathrooms. It also has a living room and storage space. The second floor has two bedrooms, a dressing area, attached bathrooms and space for storage. The bedrooms are connected to a spacious balcony and the roof level has a maid’s room with a bathroom and terrace.
Verdana townhouses are designed for a high-end lifestyle. Source: Reportage Properties.

payment
PAYMENT PLAN
Verdana Dubai Investments Park offers townhouses with attractive payment plan options. A 10% payment needs to be made at the time of booking. Contact Reportage Properties to learn more about instalments and % payment breakdown.

FAQs about Verdana
WHERE IS VERDANA LOCATED?
Verdana is located in Dubai Investments Park, Dubai. The development is close to Golf City, Remraam and Jumeirah Golf Estates.
THE PROJECT IS CATEGORISED INTO HOW MANY SUB-COMMUNITIES?
The off-plan development will have two sub-communities: Verdana I and Verdana II.
WHAT TYPE OF PROPERTY IS OFFERED IN VERDANA FOR INVESTMENT?
Interested investors can buy townhouses for sale in Verdana starting from as low as AED 1.19M.
HOW MANY RESIDENTIAL UNITS ARE AVAILABLE IN THIS PROJECT?
There are 305 townhouses in 4-bedroom units.
CAN FOREIGNERS INVEST IN VERDANA?
Yes, expats and foreign investors who don’t live in the UAE can buy property because Verdana is a freehold development.
IS VERDANA A COMPLETED PROJECT?
The development is under construction, estimated to be completed in the first quarter of 2026.
*Featured image source: Reportage Properties

about-:
A project by Indigo Properties, Indigo Ville is a residential development divided into eight sub-districts. It is located in Jumeirah Village Circle between Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Al Khail Road and Al Barsha Road. Indigo Ville 8 is one of these residential sub-districts in District 15. The construction of the project started in 2007 and was completed in 2016. The project is located on plot JVC15T003.
The architect of Indigo Ville 8 JVC is Al Saraya Architects. The sub-community features 18 three-storey Mediterranean-style townhouses surrounded by open spaces. These houses have 4 and 5 bedrooms. Each residential cluster in Indigo Ville has a swimming pool and a fully equipped gym.
in-a-nutshell:
One of the eight residential clusters in Indigo Ville
Located in District 15, Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC)
Developed by Indigo Group
The architect of the project is Al Saraya Architects
Mediterranean style townhouses 
Available in 4 and 5-bedroom layouts
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
The highlights of Indigo Ville 8 JVC are:
Fully equipped gym
Swimming pool
Green spaces
Residents can find jogging trails, a fully equipped gym, a swimming pool and a health club within the neighbourhood. Families can also find international schools and community centres close to their homes.
PROPERTIES IN INDIGO VILLE 8 JUMEIRAH VILLAGE CIRCLE
Properties in Indigo Ville 8 JVC include 18 three-storey Mediterranean style townhouses in 4 and 5-bedroom configurations. These houses span 1,681 sq. ft. to 4,000 sq. ft.
Each residential unit comes with master bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and built-in wardrobes. The property also includes a maid’s room with an en-suite bathroom, a guest bathroom, an open-plan kitchen, a living room, a dining area, a barbeque area, a private garden, a rooftop terrace and parking spaces.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN INDIGO VILLE 8 DUBAI
There are private parking spaces in Indigo Ville 8 Dubai. Each townhouse and villa comes with a dedicated space for two cars. Guests can settle for street parking.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN INDIGO VILLE 8 DUBAI
When it comes to transportation near Indigo Ville 8 Dubai, you can find many options, including bus stops, metro stations, and taxis. You can catch the J01 bus from various bus stops. The nearest ones are JVC, Sandoval Lane Apartments 1 bus stop, JVC, Season Community Autumn bus stop, JVC, Season Community Summer bus stop, JVC, Shoba Daffodil Apartments 1 bus stop and JVC, Samer Park bus stop. These are accessible at a 3 to 5-minute driving distance from the sub-community.
Umm Al Sheif Metro Station is the nearest metro station around 10 minutes away. Online cab booking services such as Uber, Careem or RTA Smart Taxis are also available.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near:
There are numerous supermarkets near Indigo Ville 8 JVC for grocery shopping. Cart Supermarket, Aswaaq Mart JVC, BROZ Mart, Greens Minimart, VIVA Supermarket, Tudomart Supermarket are popular choices at a 3 to 6-minute drive away.
For larger grocery hauls, one can find renowned supermarkets in Dubai such as Choithrams in Manhattan Tower, Spinneys supermarket in Circle Mall and West Zone Fresh Supermarket in Plaza Residences. These hypermarkets are located within JVC at a 7 to 9-minute driving distance.
Choithrams in The Manhattan
mosques-near:
Residents can find a few mosques within JVC. Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf and Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque are popular choices.
Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque in Jumeirah Village Circle
You can also find a mosque next to Circle Mall, JVC Masjid and Mohammad AlShirawi Mosque at an 8 to 9-minute drive by car.
other-places-of-worship:
Those looking for churches near Indigo Ville 8 Dubai can visit Haley’s Church and The Gatekeepers Weekday Warehouse, located in Al Quoz Industrial Area 4. These churches are a 13-minute drive away. Old Apostolic Church in Barsha Heights and Fellowship Church in Al Sufouh 2 are also at the same driving distance. One can also visit The Emirate Baptist Church in Al Barsha 1, which is a 17-minute drive from the sub-community.
The beautiful interior of the St. Francis of Assisi Church Dubai
Some popular Dubai churches are located in Jebel Ali Village, about 20 minutes away. You can find St. Francis of Assisi Catholic Church, Christ Church, The Filipino Christian Church of Dubai, St Mina Coptic Orthodox Church, Dubai Mar Thoma Church and many more churches here.
Entrance of Dubai Mar Thoma Church in Jebel Ali
Sai Baba Temple in Jumeirah 1 is around a 26-minute drive from the sub-community. Hindu residents can also visit Bur Dubai temples which are around a 33-minute drive by car. These include Shiva Temple, Shiridi Sai Baba Temple and ShrinathJi Temple.
ShrinathJi Temple in Bur Dubai
Guru Nanak Darbar Gurdwara is one of the largest gurdwaras in the world. It is located in Jebel Ali Village, around 17 minutes away.
Guru Nanak Gurdwara in Jebel Ali Village is a community-run worship place
SCHOOLS NEAR INDIGO VILLE 8 JUMEIRAH VILLAGE CIRCLE
There are many schools and nurseries in the area, including:
Kids World Nursery JVC
Ladybird Early Learning Centre
Kids World Nursery JVC is located at R-02 Autumn 2 Seasons Community at a 5-minute drive by car. Ladybird Early Learning Centre is located at Jumeirah Village South, 12 Street 26, at a 7-minute driving distance. These are some of the best nurseries in Jumeirah Village Circle where toddlers can get the Early Years training.
Schools near Indigo Ville 8 Jumeirah Village Circle include:
UEG School
JSS International School
UEG School is a 4-minute drive by car. JSS International School offers the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) curriculum from Foundation Stage to Grade 12. The program provides collaborative learning through role-plays, interactive sessions, project works and games. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai located between Hessa Street and Al Khail Road.
Entrance of JSS International School
Residents can find many universities in Dubai Knowledge Park offering higher education. These include Middlesex University, Murdoch University Dubai, Abu Dhabi University, University of Wollongong, Cambridge College International and the University of Manchester around 15 minutes away.
The University of Wollongong Dubai has a purpose-built campus in Dubai Knowledge Park
CLINICS AND HOSPITALS NEAR INDIGO VILLE 8 DUBAI
Clinics and Hospitals near Indigo Ville 8 include:
Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic
Karama Medical Centre
Saudi German Hospital Dubai
Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic is a dental clinic in Prime Business Centre at an 8-minute drive away. Residents can also find a branch of Karama Medical Centre at the same driving distance. It is one of the leading medical centres in Jumeirah Village Circle, staffed with a professional and efficient team of doctors and nurses.
For specialised medical treatments, residents can head over to Saudi German Hospital Dubai. It is one of the best Al Barsha hospitals that offer top-notch healthcare services to patients in need of medical attention. It is known for being one of the best emergency care hospitals in the city. It is located at Hessa Street 331 West, Al Barsha 3, Exit 36 Sheikh Zayed Road, at a 10-minute drive by car.
nearby-areas:
Being one of the eight sub-communities of Indigo Ville, the area is surrounded by some popular buildings. The ones near Indigo Ville 8 Dubai include:
Evershine One
National Bonds Residence
Indigo Ville 7
Evershine One is a 4-storey residential tower that offers 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. National Bonds Residence is a residential building developed by Binghatti Developers. It has five floors dedicated to studios, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. A sister community, Indigo Ville 7, features Mediterranean styled townhouses as 3 and 4-bed units.
Some well-established nearby communities include:
Jumeirah Village Triangle
Dubai Production City
Dubai Sports City
Jumeirah Village Triangle is a residential development that is home to over 5,000 villas and apartments. Dubai Production City offers a mix of residential, retail and commercial properties. Dubai Sports City is home to various sports, lifestyle and residential options.

malls-near:
Shopping malls near Indigo Ville 8 include:
Circle Mall
Motor City Shopping Centre
The Ribbon Mall
First Avenue Mall
Circle Mall is a community mall that houses more than 235 stores, eateries and entertainment zones for visitors that includes a fitness centre, a swimming pool and a community area. Visitors can also find outlets of Spinneys, Daiso and apparel brands. You can also find outlets of NBar, Flormar, Starbucks, Baskin Robbins, Nesto Supermarket and other renowned retail and food & beverage brands. It is located between Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, Al Khail Road and Hessa Street Dubai.
Motor City Shopping Centre in Green Community Motor City is another shopping destination where you can go for a shopping spree. The Ribbon Mall is also located in Dubai Autodrome & Business Park 1 at an 11-minute drive by car.
First Avenue Mall is an automotive and lifestyle-themed mall spanning over 500,000 sq. ft. The mall has 50 high-street retail stores and an indoor-outdoor boulevard.
First Avenue Mall is popular among shoppers for its unique automobile and lifestyle theme
Some popular First Avenue Mall shops include:
Plush Tan
V Perfume
Bath & Body Works
Ace Hardware
The mall also has a branch of Carrefour, Al Ansari Exchange, The Nail Spa and BinSina Pharmacy.

beaches-near:
For some coastal fun head over to Pine Beach located at King Salman Bin Abdulaziz Al Saud Street, Al Sufouh 2, just 14 minutes away. The renowned Al Sufouh Beach, also known as the Secret Beach, is perfect for soaking up the sun. Visitors can take amazing photos with the spectacular backdrop of the Burj Al Arab. It is a 15-minute drive away from the neighbourhood.
Visitors can play beach volleyball at Al Sufouh Beach
LEISURE ACTIVITIES AND NOTABLE LANDMARKS
Some leisure places and notable landmarks near the area include:
The Els Club
Dubai Miracle Garden
Dubai Butterfly Garden
Dubai Autodrome
The Els Club is one of the popular golfing destinations in the city. It is managed by the world’s leading golf management company, Troon. The 18-hole golf course features four sets of tees. The clubhouse boasts several amenities such as locker rooms, member’s lounge, corporate and conferencing facilities, locker rooms and restaurants. It also has steam rooms, saunas, and Jacuzzis.
Practice golf at the Els Club in Dubai
Dubai Miracle Garden is a unique floral attraction in Dubailand. It boasts stunning attractions such as Giant Tortoise, Lost Paradise, Disney Avenue, Mickey Mouse, Life-Size Emirates A380 and others.
Giant tortoise at Dubai Miracle Garden
 Right next to Miracle Garden, there is Dubai Butterfly Garden. The recreational facility is home to over 15,000 butterflies belonging to 50 species.
Entrance of Dubai Butterfly Garden

about-:
Developed by Fortis Plus Holdings Limited, Mirabella is a residential community in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). The project comprises 8 sub-communities in District 11 and District 12 of JVC. Mirabella 2 is one of these sub-communities that features townhouses.
Mirabella 2 is a townhouse sub-community in District 11. It is a row of 16 three-storey townhouses featuring three bedrooms on the eastern side of the district. The construction of these townhouses started in 2007 and was completed by 2010. The community is well connected to main highways and provides easy access to communal facilities.

Properties in Mirabella 2 include 3-bedroom townhouses. The covered area of these G+2 homes ranges from 3,300 sq. ft. to 3,600 sq. ft. The basement is spacious and can be converted into a 4th bedroom, a maid’s room or even a gym. The ground floor features a kitchen, a living/ dining room and parking spaces for two cars. The first floor features a master bedroom and a spacious family area that leads to a huge terrace. The second floor has two master bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and balconies.

about-: A project by Indigo Group, Indigo Ville is a residential development scattered in different districts of Jumeirah Village Circle. It is a townhouse community featuring eight sub-communities. Indigo Ville 7 is one of these sub-communities located in District 15.  It features a row of 12 three-storey Mediterranean styled townhouses in 4-bed configurations. The project is located on plot JVC15T003. The construction of the Indigo Villa 7 project started in 2007 and was completed in 2016.

Properties in Indigo Ville 7 include 12 Mediterranean-styled townhouses in 4-bedroom configurations. These are G+2 floor houses. On the first level, there is a master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and attached balcony, a family room and another bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and balcony.
There are two other bedrooms with bathrooms and a balcony on the second floor. On the ground floor, there is a living room, a dining room, a well-equipped kitchen, a maid’s room with an attached bathroom, a courtyard, a garden and a car garage.

about-: Divided into eight sub-districts, Indigo Ville is a residential development in JVC, Jumeirah Village Circle. It is located between Al Khail Road, Emirates Road and Al Barsha Road. Indigo Ville 3 is one of these residential clusters in District 13, JVC. Developed by Indigo Group, the construction of the project started in 2007 and was completed in 2013. The area features three-storey Mediterranean-style townhouses. The residential cluster also has a fully equipped gym and a swimming pool.
in-a-nutshell:
A residential sub-community in Jumeirah Village Circle
One of the eight residential clusters in Indigo Ville
Located in District 13
Developed by Indigo Group
Completed by 2013
Mediterranean style townhouses surrounded by green open spaces
Available in 3 and 4-bedroom layouts

community-overview:
Indigo Ville 3 JVC Dubai is a place that blends convenience and comfort to provide an ideal living space. Key highlights of the sub-community are:
Fully equipped gym
Swimming pool
Residents of Indigo Ville 3 have access to numerous lifestyle amenities. There are jogging trails, a health club, a fully equipped gym and a swimming pool for those who want to stay fit. The area also features international schools, country clubs and community centres.
PROPERTIES IN INDIGO VILLE 3 JVC DUBAI
Properties in Indigo Ville 3 include Mediterranean styled, 3-storey townhouses in 4-bedroom configurations. These residential units cover 1,724 sq. ft. to 4,578 sq. ft. and boast elegant interiors and premium finishing. These houses have four en-suite bedrooms with balconies, built-in wardrobes and five bathrooms. You can also find a maid’s room with an attached bathroom, a well-equipped, spacious kitchen, a living room, a dining area, a barbeque area, a guest bathroom, a garden and covered parking.

supermarkets-near:
Residents can stock groceries from supermarkets near Indigo Ville 3 Dubai. Cisty’s Supermarket, Day Mart, Needs Supermarket, Sprouts Hypermarket LLC, Rubiyan Grocery, Door to Door Mini Mart, Holiday Minimart and Need Supermarket are the nearest options at a 2 to 4-minute drive.

JVC residents can visit Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque
JVC Masjid and a mosque next to Circle Mall are a 7 to 9-minute drive by car.
other-places-of-worship:
Those looking for Hindu temples near Indigo Ville 3 can find Sai Baba Temple Jumeirah in Jumeirah 1 at a 29-minute drive away. Other Bur Dubai temples are a 35-minute drive away. These include Shiva Temple, Sindhi Gurdarbar, Shiridi Sai Baba Temple and ShrinathJi Temple.
Shrinathji Mandir in Bur Dubai
Other churches near this townhouse cluster are Old Apostolic Church in Barsha Heights (16 minutes away), Fellowship Church in Al Sufouh 2 (16 minutes away), Haley’s Church in Al Quoz Industrial Area 4 ( 17 minutes away) and The Emirate Baptist Church in Al Barsha 1 (18 minutes away). Besides these, residents can find some of the popular Dubai churches in Jebel Ali Village, about 20 minutes away.

Ladybird Early Learning Centre
Kids World Nursery
Schools near Indigo Ville 3:
UEG School
JSS International School
UEG School is a 6-minute drive by car. JSS International School is located on 111 Street in Jumeirah Village Circle, at a 9-minute driving distance. It is a private co-educational school established in 2009. It follows the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) curriculum from Foundation Stage to Grade 12. The program provides interactive sessions, collaborative learning through role-plays, project works and games. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai that is well-equipped with lecture halls, an IT lab, a well-stocked library, Physics, Maths, Biology and Chemistry labs, an auditorium, a counselling centre and a project room.
Street view of JSS International School
Students looking for admission in bachelor or master’s degree programs can find Keystrokes University in Jumeirah Park at a 17-minute driving distance.
You can also find universities in Dubai Knowledge Park such as Middlesex University, Michigan State University in Dubai, Murdoch University Dubai, Abu Dhabi University, University of Wollongong, Cambridge College International and the University of Manchester around 17 minutes away from townhouse row.
CLINICS AND HOSPITALS NEAR INDIGO VILLE 3
Those looking for clinics and hospitals near Indigo Ville 3 can visit
Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic
Karama Medical Centre
HMC Medical Center
Coopers Health Clinic Motorcity
Neuro Spinal Hospital
Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic is the nearest option for those looking for a dentist. It is located in Prime Business Centre at a 2-minute drive away. There is a branch of Karama Medical Centre in JVC at a 7-minute driving distance. It is one of the leading medical centres in Jumeirah Village Circle, staffed with a professional team of doctors and nurses. It caters to medical services in the field of General Medicine, ENT, Dermatology, Orthopaedics and Gynaecology. Patients admitted can avail of CT scans, ultrasounds, X-rays, MRIs and other diagnostic services.
HMC Medical Center is located in G03, Detroit House at a 15-minute drive away. At the same driving distance, there is Coopers Health Clinic in Apex Atrium, Motor City.
One can also find a specialised medical facility, Neuro Spinal Hospital in Dubai Science Park. It is one of the world’s best healthcare institutes for neurosurgical, neurological and orthopaedic treatments.
