about-: Haven Villas is a townhouse complex in Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), situated on the northwestern side of the city. It is a part of District 10, featuring G+2, 3-bedroom residences developed by Gulfstream. Street 11 near the cluster connects the neighbourhood to Al Khail Road, E44. Whereas, residents conveniently drive through the arterial network of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, E311 at the other end of the master community.
in-a-nutshell:
A townhouse complex in District 10, JVC
Offers 3-bedroom spacious residences
Shared amenities include pools, a spa and a fitness club
 A residential project by Gulfstream
Well-connected to the main roads
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Haven Villas Dubai is a part of the larger residential development – The Sanctuary in Jumeirah Village Circle. It is spread over an area of 7 acres featuring around 700 family homes. The first phase consists of Haven Apartments with 355 studios and 1 and 2-bedroom flats, while the second phase, Haven Villas, features 3-bedroom townhouses.
The developers had an exclusive partnership with Europe’s famous interior designer, Louise Bradley, for designing these residential properties. Besides well-developed homes, the community features several recreational facilities such as a swimming pool, fitness centre and landscaped outdoors.
properties-in:
The community consists of 3-bedroom townhouses spread over an area of 1,398 sq. ft. to 3,800 sq. ft. These duplex townhouses come with an expansive living area, European kitchen, wood stone and porcelain flooring and fully fitted en-suites and bedrooms. Townhouses in Haven Villas are well-designed residences with a maid’s room, powder room, a private garden and a parking area.
Bedrooms are built on the top floors; each has a balcony overlooking the landscaped community. There is a terrace and Jacuzzi on the rooftop, providing ample options for relaxing at home. The state-of-the-art security system, audiovisual system and lightning design are other features of these villas in the community.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN HAVEN VILLAS
Each townhouse in the community has enough parking spaces to accommodate two cars. Also, there is street parking available for frequent visitors.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR HAVEN VILLAS DUBAI
Options for public transportation near Haven Villas include bus, metro and taxi service. Residents can take the Dubai bus from JVC Noor Residences bus station and JVC Le Grand Chateau bus station in a 3 to 5-minute drive. After taking the transit line J01 from any bus station in JVC, you can reach the metro stations at a 15 to 20-minute drive. These include Al Khail Metro Station, Al Furjan Metro Station and Discovery Gardens Metro Station.
Residents with private conveyance can benefit from the well-connected road network to reach their destination. Al Khail Road (E44) and Hessa Street are closer to the community connecting to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) within 7 minutes.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near: There are many supermarkets near Haven Villas Dubai stocking a range of daily essentials. These include Greens Supermarket, Broz Grocery and The Express Cart. There is an outlet of Choithrams nearby, accessible within a walking distance of 10 minutes. It is one of the best supermarkets in Dubai, located on the ground floor of Manhattan Tower.
mosques-near:
Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque near Haven Villas
Mosques near Haven Villas JVC include Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque and Masjid Fatima Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf. Both mosques are located within a 5 to 6-minute drive from the community.
other-places-of-worship:
Dubai Mar Thoma Church and St. Francis of Assisi Church are two reputable churches in Dubai situated a 16-minute drive away from Haven Villas. Christian fellows can drive via Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road to visit these churches in the vicinity.
It will take a 25 to 30-minute long drive for Hindu community members to visit Bur Dubai temples. They can participate in daily prayers and events organized on special occasions such as Shiv Ratri. The largest Gurdwara in the region, Guru Nanak Darbar, is also located within a short drive of 17 minutes from the community.
SCHOOLS NEAR HAVEN VILLAS
One of the foremost features of living in Jumeirah Village Circle is that parents with toddlers and school-going children will find plenty of reputable education institutes nearby. Ladybird Nursery and Kids World Nursery are two of the popular nurseries in Jumeirah Village Circle conveniently accessible from Haven Villas.
JSS International School is located near the townhouse complex
In a 5-minute walk, residents can reach JSS International School offering education to Kindergarten to Grade 12 children. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai, with a wide range of extra-curricular activities besides the academic curriculum. Other reputed schools near Haven Villas Dubai include Sunmarke School and Arcadia School.
clinics-and-hospitals-near: Karama Medical Centre is one of the top clinics in JVC for residents of the villa community. It offers medical treatments for general medicine, dentistry, orthopaedics, paediatrics and obstetrics and gynaecology. The clinic is situated at a 3-minute drive near City Apartments JVC. Other hospitals near Haven Villas are Mediclinic Me’aisem and American Hospital Al Barsha.
nearby-areas:
Haven Villas is surrounded by popular apartment complexes and villa and townhouse communities of JVC. Aurion Residence and Le Grand Chateau are located on the eastern side, while Regel Apartments and Mar Residences are situated on the western side of the community.
Moreover, Goldenwoods Villas and Westar Les Maisonettes are two villa communities close to the townhouse cluster. Other more popular residential areas near the townhouse complex include Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT) and Al Barsha South.

The Mall of the Emirates is a go-to for all retail and leisure needs
Mall of the Emirates is another mall near Haven Villas, home to around 630 retail outlets of popular fashion brands, department stores and two 5-star hotels. It will take a 13-minute drive to reach the shopping mall.
restaurants-near: Some of the best restaurants near Haven Villas include Socialicious, Deccan Delight Restaurant, Marmarita and Ricky’s Restaurant. beaches-near:

Miracle Garden

The construction of the project started in 2011 and was completed by 2014. Indigo Ville JVC comprises eight sub-communities that have 15 three-storey townhouses each in 3 and 4-bed layouts. Indigo Ville 1 is one of the eight Indigo Ville sub-communities and is located in District 11, JVC.

JSS International School is located between Hessa Street and Al Khail Road E44. It offers the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) curriculum from Foundation Stage to Grade 12. The program provides collaborative learning through role-plays, interactive sessions, project works and games. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai that is well-equipped with Physics, Maths, Biology and Chemistry labs, an auditorium, lecture halls, a counselling centre, a project room, an IT lab and a well-stocked library.
Street view of JSS International School
Global Indian International School follows a hybrid curriculum – CBSE and IBDP. Enjoying a prime location in Dubai, the campus is a 6-minute drive from the sub-community.
Sunmarke School is a private and co-education school that enrol students aged 3 to 18 years old. It is a part of the Fortes Education Group and follows the UK curriculum. The school combines positive education (PostEd) culture with the British educational programme that focuses on improving the students’ wellbeing.  It also adopts specialised learning methods, such as Digital Learning, MultiSmart Learning and STEAM Learning. All these learning techniques allow the school to expand the scope of their curriculum and help students become life-long learners. It is located in front of The Imperial Residence near the roundabout of D33 Street and D41 Street in Jumeirah Village Triangle.
Coming to higher education, you can find many universities in Dubai Knowledge Park. These include Middlesex University, Murdoch University Dubai, Abu Dhabi University, University of Wollongong, Cambridge College International and the University of Manchester around 14 to 16 minutes away.

about-: Lilac Park is a townhouse row in District 12, Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). Lilac Park JVC features a row of 20 three-storey townhouses in 4-bedroom configurations, designed by Federal Engineering Consultants. Novelia is a revolutionary lifestyle concept in Victory Heights, a district within Dubai Sports City at the intersection of Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, E311 and Hessa Street, D61. It is a gated residential sub-community to the southwest of the development. Family-friendly and vibrant, Novelia offers a total of 98 units as a mix of 5 and 6-bedroom villas.
Victory Heights is a large villa community consisting of over 1,000 villas. The neighbourhood is home to Fairways Els Golf Club and is ideal for sports fans.

PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR NOVELIA SPORTS CITY
For those who depend on public transportation near Novelia Sports City, several bus stops are a short walk away, accessible within 6 to 13 minutes. These include Sports City, Victory Heights West Gate 1 bus stop, Sports City, Victory Heights West Gate 2 bus stop, Sports City, Golf Tower 1 bus stop and Sports City, Golf Tower 2 bus stop. Residents can rely on taxis and buses – two common modes of Dubai’s public transport system to move around.
Dubai Metro has been an integral part of public transportation since its launch in 2009. From Novelia, several metro stations are reachable in 11 to 13 minutes by car. DMCC Metro Station is the closest, at an approximate 11-minute short drive. Also, residents can use three stations added to Dubai Metro’s Route 2020. The Gardens Metro Station is a 12-minute drive and Discovery Gardens Metro Station and Al Furjan Metro Station 13 minutes away.

Training pitches in Dubai Sports City

Residents looking for means of public transportation near Mirabella 3 can find Dubai Bus, metro and taxi service in a short drive. They can take Bus J01 from JVC Mirabella Villas 2 bus station is a 5-minute drive. The nearest metro stations include Discovery Gardens Metro Station and Al Furjan Metro Station. The commute is quite convenient if you are travelling using private conveyance. Hessa Street runs towards the eastern side of the community connecting residents with Al Khail Road and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road in a 4 to 8-minute drive. You can reach the sought-after neighbourhoods of the emirate, such as Dubai Marina and Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR), in a 20-minute drive using the same route.

about-:
Marbella Village in Dubai Sports City is a gated sub-community. It was the ninth and last project to be completed in Victory Heights. The area offers family homes in proximity to all the basic lifestyle amenities.
Victory Heights in Dubai Sports City is a popular villa community featuring over 1,000 residential units. It is linked to Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road, E311 and Al Fay Road. The strategic location allows residents to commute in and out of the area conveniently.
The residential sub-community, Marbella Village in DSC is a townhouse cluster featuring 96 Spanish homes. Interested buyers and tenants can choose from a wide range of 4-bedroom townhouses and villas. These homes have attractive architecture and stunning green surroundings. Also, the residential properties are compatible to smart home technology.
in-a-nutshell:
A residential cluster within Victory Heights
Located in Dubai Sports City
96 modern villas and townhouses in 4-bed configurations
Quick access to schools, shopping centres and restaurants
Sports facilities in proximity
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Marbella Village Victory Heights is an ideal sub-community for those who wish to stay away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Some popular points of interest in the neighbourhood are:
Landscaped gardens, parks and community centre 
Access to sports facilities, DSC Sports Park and The Els Club
Round the clock security
Amenities of Marbella Village in DSC are shared with the wider Victory Heights community. These include grassy playgrounds, parks and open spaces, lakes, a fitness centre, a championship golf course, basketball courts, bicycle routes, swimming pools and walkways.
PROPERTIES IN MARBELLA VILLAGE, VICTORY HEIGHTS
When it comes to architectural choices, residents would be pleased with the variety of styling concepts and designs in Victory Heights. There is a wide range of attractive properties for sale in Victory Heights as well as rental units.
Properties in Marbella Village include 4-bedroom villas and townhouses. These houses have four spacious bedrooms, a maid’s room, fitted wardrobes, en-suite bathrooms, a large living/dining room, a kitchen, a laundry room, a large private garden and a rooftop terrace. Each townhouse also has a closed garage that can accommodate two vehicles.
The Marbella Village townhouses follow the Dubai Municipality’s Green Building Regulations ensuring reduced consumption of energy. The homes feature smart home technology that is incorporated into air-conditioning and room lighting. The contemporary European fittings and fixtures are functional and attractive. Other features include wooden doors, marble flooring, durable paints and aluminium windows.

Dubai Autodrome
Those willing to enjoy hot-air balloon rides in Dubai can head towards Balloon Adventures Emirates. The company is best known for peregrine falcon flights and is operational since 2005. It offers high-end ballooning services in terms of flight experience, food along pick and drop services.
Various packages are available for ballooning services. The package may include an in-flight falcon show, wildlife safaris through the Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve in vintage land rovers, cultural shows, camel rides, a night at Arabic stone dwellings and breakfast at the Heritage camp. The venue is located at 303 Control Tower, Motor City, a 10-minute drive away from the neighbourhood.
Spanning 72,000 sq. m., Dubai Miracle Garden is a tourist attraction in Dubailand. It is home to over 50 million floral arrangements in 2D and 3D designs. Apart from the key attractions, there are many new additions to the Miracle Garden. There is a 400m walking track for visitors. You can also attend weekly live shows, street performances and floral parades.
A gorgeous view of Disney Avenue at Dubai Miracle Garden
In proximity to Dubai Miracle Garden, Dubai Butterfly Garden features over 15,000 butterflies belonging to 50 species. It offers 10 climate-controlled custom domes to give its inhabitants a comfortable space to fly around.
Entrance of Dubai Butterfly Garden
If you want to ride a bike, Dubai Autodrome is a place to be. It is a renowned motorsport facility that features a 5.39 km circuit in six configurations. One can also find a racing school, the Motorsport Business Park, the Grandstand Retail Plaza, and other recreational facilities. It is located in Motor City at a 13-minute drive by car.
Go-kart around the circuit at Dubai Autodrome

Be the best version of yourself at Prime Fitness JVC
JVC has several salons and spas for personal grooming and well-being. You can visit any of these salons and spas near Westar La Residencia del Sol Dubai.

properties-in:

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN LOTUS PARK
Each townhouse comes with a dedicated facility accommodating residents and visitors
Residents can find ample parking spaces in Lotus Park. Each house comes with a covered and dedicated car parking area for one or two vehicles while visitors can use the street parking facility.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN LOTUS PARK
Commuting through public transportation in Lotus Park isn’t a hassle since several bus stations are located a short distance from the community. These include the JVC Season Community bus station and JVC Noor Residence bus station from where residents can take Bus J01. Moreover, the nearest metro stations include the Mall of the Emirates metro station and Nakheel metro station. Both stations are accessible within a 15 to 20-minute drive.

supermarkets-near:

There are several supermarkets near Lotus Park from where residents can buy grocery items and daily usage products. These include Green Mini Mart, Blue Mart Supermarket and Jyothi’s Supermarket. All these grocery stores are accessible within a 10 to 15-minute walk. For monthly grocery shopping, some of the best supermarkets in Dubai like Carrefour, Aswaaq and Spinneys are located in proximity to the townhouse complex.
mosques-near:
Muslims can conveniently offer their prayers in Masjid Fatima Sayed near the community
Muslim residents can offer their prayers in Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque, Masjid JVC and Masjid Fatima Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf. These mosques near Lotus Park are located a 4 to 7-minute drive away. One of the beautiful mosques in Dubai, Al-Salam Mosque in Al Barsha area is located a 15-minute drive away. It has two minarets and multiple domes arranged in a pyramid-like fashion.
other-places-of-worship:

Hindu residents can visit Bur Dubai temples within a 20-minute drive. Shiva Temple, Shiridi Sai Baba Mandir and Shree Krishna Haveli are a few temples near Lotus Park.

Kids World Nursery is one of the popular nurseries in JVC located a short drive away. It has well-designed classrooms with dedicated mathematics, language and cultural spaces. Other facilities in the nursery include a yoga and dance studio, café and clinic.
For parents with school-going children, some of the reputable education institutes lie in proximity to the neighbourhood. Some of the schools near Lotus Park include:
JSS International School

Dubai Heights Academy
JSS International School follows the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) curriculum from Kindergarten to Grade 12. It is one of the top Indian schools in Dubai with a wide range of educational facilities and extra-curricular activities. It will take a 13-minute walk to reach the school.

Another popular leisure spot nearby is Ski Dubai. It is an indoor resort in the Mall of the Emirates surrounded by restaurants and chalets. All these options are only a short drive away. There are several options of secondary schools ear Mulberry Park include:
Sunmarke School Dubai (JVT)
Nord Anglia International School Dubai
Dubai British School
Sunmarke School Dubai (JVT) is accessible via car, taking about 10 minutes. The school offers the IB Diploma and IB Career-related Programme. It is the British Curriculum school in the UAE that is offering  International Baccalaureate, A-Levels and BTECs.
Nord Anglia International School Dubai takes 15-minutes drive to reach. It is a school that follows the English National Curriculum and Dubai British School which is located at a distance of 13-minutes drive away, follows the National Curriculum for England.
The nearest universities are Middlesex University Dubai and the University of Wollongong in Dubai (UOWD). Both of the universities are accessible in 13-minutes away.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:

Its services include cosmetic dentistry, oral surgery and preventative care. Crystal White Specialty Dental Clinic is another clinic located at a distance of 10-minutes drive and Mediclinic Me’aisem is 14-minutes away.
Hospitals near Mulberry include Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Center, Karama Medical Centre and Mediclinic Parkview Hospital. Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Center provides a range of premium, quality-driven medical facilities and services. In a short span of time, it has become a leading and trusted healthcare providers in the UAE. It can be accessed after 1-minutes drive by car.
Karama Medical Centre is a preferred hospital for the UAE nationals and also for the expatriate community in Dubai due to its high standards and efficiency of service of medical care it holds. It is only five minutes away.

about-:
Al Habtoor City (also called Al Habtoor and Habtoor City) is located in the centre of Business Bay, right on the banks of the Dubai Water Canal and in proximity to the popular neighbourhood of Downtown Dubai. Developed by Al Habtoor Group, the project features three major components: residential, hotel and entertainment options.
The first phase includes the Residence Collection complex which consists of three residential towers in Al Habtoor City. With a residential capacity of 1,000 apartments, the complex offers furnished living spaces and a range of modern facilities. The second phase of the community features three luxury 5-star hotels and resorts. And finally, the third phase is the waterfront leisure deck in the heart of the development. It will feature cafes, boutiques, restaurants, shopping avenues, health clubs and fun activities for kids and adults.
Simply said, Al Habtoor City is a multi-faceted zone near Downtown Dubai and it attracts residents and tourists from around the world every year. It is also the first integrated residential, leisure and hospitality complex overlooking the banks of Dubai Canal.
in-a-nutshell:
Multi-purpose development in Business Bay Dubai
Home to three residential and three hotel towers
Properties offer views of the canal and Dubai skyline
Houses a range of eateries, boutiques and spa facilities
Complete leisure deck within the complex
Features luxury apartments and penthouses
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
As the name suggests, Al Habtoor is a complete city within a city that offers modern residential facilities as well as entertainment options. It is well equipped with amenities such as:
A tennis academy
Air-conditioned clubhouse
Maintained community gardens
Besides, its location allows direct access to major attractions in Downtown Dubai. While in Habtoor City, residents will find many facilities are provided inside the community gates. Similarly, guests at the resort will enjoy a range of entertainment options while residents will find other amenities like schools and clinics in the neighbouring communities.
properties-in:
The residential side of Al Habtoor City Dubai includes the Residence Collection’s three towers completed in 2017. The two 75-storey towers and one 52-storey skyscraper are home to more than 1,000 apartment units and 12 penthouses. These residential blocks part of the Residence Collection are named Noora, Amna and Meera and offer contemporary 1, 2, 3 and 4-bed units. Moreover, one can also find penthouses in this complex.
The Residence Collection’s towering skyscrapers
You can find a range of penthouses in Al Habtoor City including three simplexes, six duplexes and three VIP units. Simplex penthouses span across 8,611.13 sq. ft. featuring private pools and Jacuzzis. These units have 5 spacious bedrooms and en-suite bathrooms. Duplex penthouses cover around 9,278.49 sq. ft. of space and feature the same facilities. Except, these units have two master suites and a home theatre too.
Lastly, VIP penthouses are 4-storey units with 7 bedrooms. There’s also one master bedroom with separate ‘his and hers’ bathrooms. Besides the basic penthouse facilities including a pool, Jacuzzi and steam room, these units have garden terraces. Also, the top two floors feature a private entertainment area and sky lounge with an exclusive entrance for residents.

AL HABTOOR CITY FLOOR PLANS
Those looking for Al Habtoor City floor plans can browse through the floor plans available for popular buildings in the community.
HOTELS IN AL HABTOOR CITY
There are three 5-star hotels in Al Habtoor City Dubai, namely:
Habtoor Palace
Hilton Dubai
V Hotel Dubai
Rebranded in 2018, Habtoor Palace Dubai, LXR Hotels and Resorts features 23 restaurants and bars, outdoor pools, a private helipad, a spa and a tennis academy. It has 12 types of luxury suites.
Second, Hilton Dubai is 44-storey tall with choices of 12 luxury suites. It also has similar facilities including Elixir Spa, 11 restaurants and 16 meeting rooms. Third, V Hotel Dubai also offers a similar luxury-style staycation and a choice of 365 guestrooms overlooking the canal. Listed among the top hotels in Business Bay, it also has gourmet restaurants and bars.
TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN AL HABTOOR CITY
As for parking spaces in Al Habtoor City Dubai, residents and guests won’t have a problem. The Residence Collection complex can hold a capacity of 5,000 cars.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR ALHABTOOR CITY
Those who’d rather prefer public transport in Business Bay to commute around the city have plenty of options. There are metro stations, buses and even water taxis that serve the area. Like other parts of Business Bay, the metro is the most popular mode of transportation near Al Habtoor City. The nearest stations are Business Bay Metro Station and Burj Khalifa/ Dubai Mall Metro Station a mere 6 to 7-minute drive away.
Business Bay Metro Station
One can catch a bus from Safa Intersection, Al Quoz Municipality Centre or Lillian Tower bus stops. These bus stops are accessible in less than 10 minutes. Further, motorists will find they can easily access Sheikh Zayed Road (E11), Al Meydan Road (D69) and Al Khail Road (E44) from Al Habtoor City.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near:
These are some supermarkets near Al Habtoor City:
West Zone Fresh Supermarket
Al Maya Supermarket
Carrefour Hypermarket
West Zone Fresh is 11 minutes away in MBK Tower, E11 Road. Al Maya is another option at a 10-minute drive in Clover Bay Tower, Business Bay. There is also a Viva supermarket UAE nearby located a 13-minute drive away.
mosques-near: Finding a mosque near Al Habtoor City Business Bay might get a little tricky. However, the complex has a prayer hall within. Those who want to visit a proper mosque can visit Khalifa Bin Da’en Mosque, 9 minutes away.
other-places-of-worship:
As for churches and temples near Al Habtoor City, there aren’t many options in Business Bay. Emirates Baptist Church is 17 minutes away in Al Barsha while temples in Bur Dubai are 13 minutes away.
SCHOOLS NEAR AL HABTOOR CITY
Some pre-schools and nurseries nearby include:
Maple Bear
Blossom Nursery
Odyssey Nursery
The nearest branch of Blossom Nursery is in the Al Manzil District of Downtown Dubai. It offers the Early Years Foundation Stage (EYFS) curriculum as well as a special Skygarden course which offers a curiosity-based learning approach. The school is accessible in about 13 minutes by car.
Further, Maple Bear is a preschool that follows the Canadian curriculum and its unique development approach. Odyssey Nursery is a little farther; it follows the Washington State Early Learning Developmental Benchmarks. Schools near Al Habtoor City include:
GEMS Jumeirah Primary School
Al Ittihad Private School
Al Ittihad Private School is located a 9-minute drive away. It follows the American curriculum from pre-primary till Year 12. GEMS Jumeirah Primary School offers the UK – EYFS curriculum in the primary stages and the National Curriculum for England. It is also located in Al Safa.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
These are some medical facilities in the vicinity:
Emirates Hospital
Medcare Hospital
American Hospital Dubai
All these options for clinics and hospitals near Al Habtoor City are accessible by car. One can reach these top clinics in Business Bay in 10 to 12 minutes.
nearby-areas:
Al Habtoor City is built on the bank of the Dubai Water Canal. It is in proximity to Bay Square, South Ridge and Downtown Dubai. Moreover, the nearby sub-communities include Al Quoz 1, Al Safa and Old Town.
local_cafe
LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
MALLS NEAR AL HABTOOR CITY
The biggest attraction and shoppers paradise in the area is The Dubai Mall. Besides, Souk al Bahar and Bay Avenue Mall near Al Habtoor City Business Bay are accessible within a short drive.
Bay Avenue is a short drive away from the city
Souk al Bahar, as the name suggests, is an Arabic shopping centre with a variety of carpet, antique and lifestyle stores. It also has waterfront dining. One can reach there in around 14 minutes. Moreover, Bay Avenue Mall is a short drive away. Those looking for exclusive discount offers (especially on electronics) can go there.
RESTAURANTS IN AL HABTOOR CITY BUSINESS BAY
Amidst the hotels and resorts is The Atrium, home to many bars and restaurants in Al Habtoor City. These include:
The Rose and Clown
Blind Dragon
Sirali Dubai
Il Pastaio
The Rose and Clown is a British Pub offering classic English food and drinks while the City Grill is a South African steak house. More options include The Café at Hilton Dubai, The Market and BQ – French Kitchen. Other top restaurants in Business Bay near the community are Kitchen 6, Tong Thai and Miss Tess.
beaches-near:
Business Bay is all about bustling roads, theme parks, 5-star resorts and shopping malls. To find beaches near Al Habtoor City, you will have to travel to the neighbouring communities such as Dubai Marina and Jumeirah.
There’s more to Jumeirah Beach than surfing and beach-side eateries
Jumeirah Beach, the top-favourite choice is at a 7-minute drive while Sunset Beach is around 9 minutes away. There’s another open public beach in Jumeirah with a lesser crowd. It is a better option if you’re hoping for a relaxing evening by the sea. People also go there for swimming and water sports activities.
leisure-activities-and-notable-landmarks:
Al Habtoor has a whole master plan for entertainment options that include theatre performances, dance clubs and pubs. The best part is La Perle by Dragone, an art theatre. Another attraction is BOA nightclub which also hosts parties for the guests.
Night views of Dubai Canal
Moreover, some notable landmarks near the community include Dubai Bowling Centre and Dubai Canal. Most importantly, Al Habtoor City is built on the banks of the canal which has already become a popular attraction in the city. From running tracks and waterfront restaurants to dhow cruise trips, every minute spent on the site is worth the while.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
There is a complete health club with an equipped gym in Al Habtoor City. Besides, residents and guests get access to outdoor pools, gardens and Jacuzzi. The hotel towers are also home to luxury spas and salons offering specialised treatments from around the world.
Moreover, the finished development features a marina promenade near The Atrium, a sky garden and an amphitheatre. Further, separate play areas for children and family recreation spaces are a plus. Besides, there are sun loungers, an open-air deck, infinity pools and barbecue area and refreshment stalls.
community-events:
La Perle by Dragone is a 1,300-seat theatre with an aqua stage. The stage has more than two million litres of water so the audience is advised to keep an anorak if they get lucky for the first row.
UPCOMING PROJECTS
The 82-storey skyscraper Al Habtoor Tower is the upcoming off-plan project in Dubai that will offer 1, 2 and 3-bedroom apartments. The project by Al Habtoor Group will feature infinity pools, a luxurious spa, a library and an amenity deck. The expected completion date of the project is 2026.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
While Al Habtoor City is nothing less than a mini-city, it lacks options for kids’ schooling. However, there are some choices behind the gates in the neighbouring sub-communities. Reaching there would be a matter of a few minutes depending on the traffic as it is an important feature for people living in Business Bay.
FAQs about Al Habtoor City Project
WHERE IS AL HABTOOR CITY?
Al Habtoor City Project is a part of Business Bay located on the banks of the Dubai Canal.
WHAT TYPES OF PROPERTIES ARE AVAILABLE IN AL HABTOOR CITY?
There are 1 to 5-bedroom apartments and penthouses in Al Habtoor City available for rent and sale purposes.
IS THERE ANY OFF-PLAN PROJECT IN AL HABTOOR CITY?
Yes, Al Habtoor Tower is the latest off-plan project in the area by the esteemed Al Habtoor Group

about-: District 10 is one of the ten sub-communities within the greater community of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). It is located on the northwest front directly in link with Al Khail Road (E44). Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) and Hessa Street (D61) are the other two throughways connecting the district with the other parts of the emirate. This family-oriented community is a freehold development by Nakheel Properties.
in-a-nutshell:

Quick reach to over 30 parks in the master community
Features a variety of linear and vertical sub-communities
Part of a flagship project by the renowned Nakheel Properties

Easy access to business centres such as Internet City, Media City and Jumeirah Lake Towers
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
District 10 offers a unique combination of village-style living surrounded by a dense urban population. It is a secluded and peaceful sub-community located away from the hustle and bustle of busy city life. Despite its seclusion residents can easily get to Dubai Marina and Jumeirah Lake Towers; areas popular for their nightlife.
A district with retail shops, educational institutes and health clinics
Popular points of interest include:
Communal swimming pools
Tennis and basketball courts for residents
Fitness centres within the greater community
JVC Club – features pool, sports and dining facility
Circle Mall – A community shopping mall for JVC residents
Around 33 communal parks are located in JVC where residents can go strolling, jogging or play outdoor sports like football or cricket.

Empty residential plots for sale in District 10 and residential floors in District 10 for sale are also good choices for property investment. District 10 features studio and 1 to 4-bedroom apartments, 3 and 4-bedroom villas and townhomes and 2 to 4-bedroom penthouse apartments. Interested investors can also buy a whole residential building in District 10 available for sale.
A modernly-designed residential building in District 10 JVC

Based on searches conducted by users in Bayut.com over the last 12 months. Last updated 12 hours ago
Studio apartments offer the highest ROI in JVC District 10 of 8.14%. 1-bed apartments generate about 7.69% return on investment. 2-bedroom flats offer an ROI of about 7.52%. Whereas, the ROI of 3-bedroom flats averages at 7.40%. The ROI for 4-bed units is 5.43%.
DISTRICT 10 FLOOR PLANS
Interested ones can take a look at District 10 floorplans on Bayut. These include floor plans for various apartment buildings and villa sub-communities in the area.
TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN DISTRICT 10
Residents will enjoy hassle-free parking in District 10 as nearly all villas and townhouses come with an attached garage. Linear stay facilities also have an allocated parking space for each owner and tenant. Visitors can easily find parking spaces in District 10 as this is a residential neighbourhood with little to no commercial activities.
Several major roads link to District 10. These roads include Al Khail Road (E44), which has a connecting interchange with Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311.)
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION IN DISTRICT 10
There are about six bus stops on the premises of District 10. JVC Atlantis S 4, JVC Atlantis S 1, JVC Tuscan Residences, JVC Le Grand Chateau Block A-1, JVC Westar La Residencia and JVC Noor Residences are the bus stops in District 10. All of these bus stations are scattered around the community at a walkable distance for the residents.
The nearest point to catch a subway is located at a 9-minute driving distance, called Dubai Internet City Metro Station 2.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
SUPERMARKETS IN DISTRICT 10
There are 3 popular supermarkets in District 10:
Choithrams Manhattan Tower JVC
All Day Minimart
VIVA Supermarket – JVC
A branch of the popular supermarket chain, Choithrams in JVC
Choithrams is a multinational grocery chain operating in 25 countries worldwide. The store is known to stock, grocery items like fruits, vegetables, frozen food, meat and fish along with baked goods. Also, there is a huge collection of household items and imported products. residents can head to Choithrams for some renowned international brands like Kimball, Fruit-tella and Weetabix. All Day is known to be the best supermarket in Dubai.
Subsequently, there are many supermarkets in JVC from which residents can buy goods such as Aswaaq Mart -JVC, Spinneys JVC and Smile On Supermarket. It takes 5 to 7-minutes to drive to any of these marts.
MOSQUES IN DISTRICT 10
Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque serves as the community mosque for District 10 residents. Designed by Nakheel Properties, the mosque has on-site parking too to facilitate worshippers.
Saleh Bin Lahej Mosque in JVC is located within a walking distance
Practising Muslims can also take benefit of the mosques in the larger JVC community such as Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf, also known as JVC Masjid. It takes 7-minutes to reach there in District 13. JVC Masjid is also designed by Nakheel properties and is regarded as the first mosque in JVC.
other-places-of-worship:
There are several churches near District 10. They include The Winning Generation Gospel Assembly, which can be reached in 10-minutes. There is also Emirates Baptist Church International (EBCI), which can be reached within 16-minutes. Another popular church is Fellowship: A Church in Dubai. This church caters to the evangelical Christian community.
Hindus living in the area can visit Hindu Temple in Jebel Ali for religious offerings. Sikhs can go to Guru Nanak Darbar, Sikh gurdwara in Jebel Ali Village. Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple is located at an accessible distance to cater to the Buddhist community in Dubai.
SCHOOLS IN DISTRICT 10
Residents will find a decent selection of reputable educational facilities nearby.
Nurseries near District 10 include:
Kids World Nursery JVC
Green Roots Nursery Dubai
Little Wonders Nursery Dubai JVC
Kids World Nursery JVC is within prompt reach
Little Wonders Nursery Dubai JVC is a mere 4-minute drive. It is approved by KHDA and follows the Early Years Foundation Stage (EYFS) curriculum. The main goal of this nursery is to provide kids with educational activities that will create within them the desire to explore the world around them.
Schools in District 10 include:
Nord Anglia International School Dubai
Global Indian International School Dubai Campus
JSS International School
JSSIS provides one of the leading curriculums (ICSE)
JSS International School is the only educational facility located within District 10. This school follows the Indian Certificate of Secondary Education (ICSE) standard curriculum, making it popular with Indian ex-pats. Other schools include Global Indian International School – Dubai Campus, which is 10-minutes away and Nord Anglia International School Dubai, located at a drive of 12-minutes.
There are some highly reputable universities near District 10 for residents who want to pursue higher education. At a distance of just 15-minutes, residents will find the University of Wollongong in Dubai (UoWD) and Middlesex University – Dubai. UoWD is a private Australian university, while Middlesex University Dubai is a UK-based institute.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Medical facilities near District 10 include:
Right Health Karama Medical Center
Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic JVC
Mediclinic Parkview Hospital
Burjeel Hospital for Advanced Surgery Dubai
Mediclinic Middle East’s third hospital in Dubai and seventh in the UAE
There are a few clinics near District 10. The nearest clinic is Right Health Karama Medical Centre at a distance of just 2-minutes. Here, residents can find general OPD treatments. A little further away is Apex Dental & Orthodontic Clinic JVC, which can take around 8-minutes to reach.
There are also several hospitals near District 10. They include Mediclinic Parkview Hospital, which is located 13-minutes away and Burjeel Hospital for Advanced Surgery Dubai a drive of 16-minutes away. This hospital specialises in orthopaedics surgeries which also includes highly advanced spine surgery.
nearby-areas:
Nearby Residential areas near District 10 include:
Jumeirah Village Triangle
Al Barsha South
Emirates Hills
Dubai Sports City
To the west lies the community of Jumeirah Village Triangle (JVT). The demographics of this community are very similar to District 10. Towards the east is the community of Al Barsha South, which is home to Dubai Miracle Garden and Dubai Butterfly Garden. Towards the north, there is Emirates Hills, which is an upscale gated community developed by Emaar Properties Group. Heading south, one will find sports themed suburb of Dubai Sports City.

SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
MALLS NEAR DISTRICT 10
Some nearby malls include:
City Centre Me’aisem
The Springs Souk
My City Centre Al Barsha
Enjoy a wide selection of shopping, dining, and activities
Malls near District 10 include City Centre Me’aisem and My City Centre Al Barsha. Both can be reached in 13-minutes. Another option, The Springs Souk is 12-minutes away from the sub-community.
Popular stores in My City Centre Al Barsha include:
Al Rifai Lebanese Mixed Nuts
Handicraft Home
Minutes Quick Services
Al Rifai Lebanese Mixed Nuts offers a unique selection of nuts, dry fruits and healthy snacks. They also offer unique blends of coffee. Handicraft Home is the go-to store for home decor items and tools. Those looking to have their watches repaired by expert hands should visit Minutes Quick Services. It is one of the few stores in Dubai that offers expert watch repairs.
RESTAURANTS IN DISTRICT 10
Restaurants in District 10 include:
Deccan Delight Restaurant Dubai
Socialicious Restaurant – House of Asian Blends
Like View Restaurant
Bawarchi Indian Restaurant JVC
Food lovers do not have to go anywhere to satisfy their cravings, several local and casual fine dines are located within the community such as Socialicious Restaurant. It serves Asian and Thai cuisine and dishes like Burmese Khao Suey and Laksa Soup are the popular ones. Deccan Delight Restaurant specialises in North Indian, Indo-Chinese and Mughlai food. Like View is a small fast-food joint in the town while Bawarci is known for its extended kebab menu.
Barasti Beach is a sports bar, which can be reached in 15-minutes. Another option, located at a distance of 14-minutes, is Jetty Lounge. This facility offers a sophisticated beach-side dining and drinking experience.
Restaurants inside My City Centre Al Barsha include:
Hatam Restaurant
McDonald’s
Tim Hortons
Papa Murphy’s
Shakespeare and Co.
Those looking for coffee and a bagel should head straight to Tim Hortons. It is a popular chain of cafes from Canada and is much loved by Canadian ex-pats.
Papa Murphy’s is a unique eatery that offers gourmet pizzas. Other popular restaurants offering a casual dining experience include Hatam Restaurant, Shakespeare and Co. and McDonald’s.
beaches-near:
Beaches near District 10 include Al Sufouh beach, which can be reached in 15-minutes. This is a fairly less crowded, white sandy beach where visitors will enjoy the view of Dubai’s skyline. Another popular beach worth visiting is Jumeirah Beach, which has dedicated BBQ stations, lifeguards and on-site security.
Al Sufouh Beach is one of Dubai’s hidden gems, hence the nickname ‘Secret Beach’
LEISURE ACTIVITIES AND NOTABLE LANDMARKS
The closest landmarks near District 10 include:
Antique Museum
Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary
Motiongate Dubai
Ras Al Khor Wildlife Sanctuary is located at an 18-minute drive and is considered a bird-watchers paradise. Motiongate Dubai is the furthest landmark from District 10 around half an hour away. But it is worth a visit as it is a popular Hollywood-themed amusement park.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
Some parks in District 10 include:
JVC District 10 Park
Sabar Community Park
Community Park District 10
There are several parks near District 10. Al Barsha Pond Park is a very popular park in the district. This is a large park with a kid’s play area and walkways where residents can enjoy jogging or casual strolls. One can reach this park in about 13-minutes. There are also some exciting parks in the nearby community of The Springs. Springs 9 Park is a large park with a dedicated kid’s play area. Those looking to enjoy a good swim can visit Springs 15 Pool and Park.
Prime Fitness JVC is the one and only gym in District 10. Nearby gyms include New Life Fitness Gym, which is located just 8-minutes away. This gym is equipped with the latest equipment for strength training and cardio. EMS Fitness is another option. Here, residents can get personalized training from highly experienced, personal trainers.
Located within District 10 JVC – Prime Fitness Gym
Salons and spas in District 10 include:
The Urban Cottage Ladies Salon and Spa
Elle et Il Ladies Saloon
Lucky’s Signature Gents Salon
BerryCut Beauty Salon
Tabassom Asgari Salon
All these spas and salons in District 10 are scattered around the community and are within easy reach of the residents. These parlours offer beauty services such as professional makeup, facials, hair styling and nail treatments. Lucky’s Signature Gents Salon is a male-only salon.
community-events: Events such as kid’s dance performances are organised throughout the year by the parent community JVC. Ramadan Souqs are organised during the holy month of Ramadan.
social-community-groups:
Although there is no specific social community group for District 10, there is a Facebook group for the parent community. Residents can join this group by searching for JVC Community – Jumeirah Village Circle Residents.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
District 10 is popular with investors looking to gain quick equity by purchasing a villa. The only downside is that there are a limited number of villas available for rent. All in all, this is a family-friendly neighbourhood that offers a peaceful living environment.

about-: Prime Villas is a gated community in Dubai Sports City offering 4 and 5-bedroom well-designed residences. Set on the southern end of the parent community, the sub-district also features a community centre with a range of recreational facilities. It is a project by Prescott Developers.
in-a-nutshell:
A gated community in Dubai Sports City
Offers 4 and 5-bedroom villas
Set close to the Els Club
Easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road and Al Khail Road (E44)
Amenities nearby include supermarkets, schools and mosques
A project by Prescott Developers
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
The gated community offers 4 and 5-bedroom residences
Prime Villas is an ideal residential community for those looking for peaceful community living. It has all the basic amenities and facilities in easy reach. Since Hessa Street (D61) is a short drive from the community, commuting to central areas isn’t a hassle. Other features of the villa community include its proximity to The Els Club, a community centre and landscaped garden.
properties-in:
There are two-storey detached and semi-detached villas in the community
Properties in Prime Villas include 31 detached and semi-detached villas available in 4 and 5-bedroom layouts. The coverage area of these residences ranges from 3,062 sq. ft. to 4613 sq. ft. The ground floor comes with an expansive family room, a majlis, a fully-fitted open kitchen and a dining area.
The master bedroom along with the rest of the bedrooms is on the first floor. Each bedroom has a walk-in closet and an attached bathroom. The balcony with each bedroom, a private garden and a maid’s room are other features of these villas for rent in Prime Villas.

PRIME VILLAS FLOOR PLANS

transportation-and-parking-spaces:
There are ample parking spaces in Prime Villas
Residents get allotted spots for parking spaces in Prime Villas. Most of the villas come with covered parking spaces accommodating two vehicles while guests can park their cars on the parking bay along the pathways.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR PRIME VILLAS
The bus stations near the community are located within a walking distance
For transportation near Prime Villas, residents can access the metro or bus service in a short drive. The nearest bus stations include Sports City Royal Residence bus station and Sports City Shami Tower bus station located within a 5-minute walk.
Jumeirah Golf Estates Metro Station and Al Furjan Metro Station on Route 2020 are accessible within a 15-minute drive by car. Those who prefer travelling via the Dubai Metro can board one from there.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
supermarkets-near:
A supermarket near the villa community
Carrefour City has a wide range of quality products at an affordable price range under one roof. It is located at a 4-minute drive on the ground floor of The Matrix Tower. Al Maya Supermarket and Spinneys are the other best supermarkets in Dubai easily accessible within a 5 to 10-minute drive. Moreover, there’s also an outlet of Grandiose Supermarket near Prime Villas close by, within Sports City.
mosques-near: Mosques near Prime Villas include Dubai Sports City Mosque, Al Abrar Mosque and Elite 4 Masjid, all accessible within a 7 to 8-minute drive.
other-places-of-worship:
Those following Sikhism can visit Guru Nanak Darbar in less than a 20-minute drive via Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road. It is the largest Gurdwara in the region with a spacious prayer hall where devotees gather for religious obligations.
Churches near Prime Villas include St. Francis of Assisi Catholic Church located at a 19-minute drive and Christ Church Jebel Ali is accessible within a 22-minute drive.
SCHOOLS NEAR PRIME VILLAS
Victory Heights School offers the National Curriculum for England to students
Nursery schools nearby are:
The Wonder Years Nursery
Emirates British Nursery
Kinder Castle Nursery
Schools nearby include:
Victory Heights Primary School
Renaissance School
Royal Grammar School Guildford Dubai
The curriculum of Victory Heights School is modelled on the National Curriculum for England. The school aims to create a fun learning environment for Foundation Stage to Year 6 students. Renaissance School is another school near Prime Villas following the US curriculum and Ministry of Education (MOE) guidelines for Arabic, Social Studies and Islamic Studies. It is located at a 4-minute drive from the villa community.
For residents looking for institutes offering graduation and post-graduation programs, there is the Manipal Academy of Higher Education for more than 40 programs from 5 different schools. The university is located at a 26-minute drive from the neighbourhood. Other universities nearby include Middlesex University and MODUL University Dubai.
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Residents can find various medical health centres nearby offering premium healthcare services to residences. These include Eupepsia Medical Clini, Aster Clinic and HMC Medical Centre. Those looking for dental clinics can head to Apex Medical and Dental Clinic in a 15-minute drive. The qualified dental team at the clinic is providing the best quality treatment to their patients. The clinic offers services for endodontics, orthodontics, dental implants and wisdom tooth removal.
Other top hospitals in Dubai near the villa community are Saudi German Hospital and Mediclinic Hospital.
nearby-areas:
Prime Villas is surrounded by popular apartment buildings and villa communities of Dubai Sports City. These include Royal Residence, Victory Heights and Zenith Towers.
The development project of Union Properties, Motor City is developed on a motorsport theme. With other attractive collections of options for everything, Motor City is home to Dubai Autodrome – the motorsport circuit of the city. It is located adjacent to Dubai Sports City. Other residential areas nearby include Jumeirah Golf Estates and DAMAC Hills.

LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
malls-near:
City Centre Me’aisem is the nearest shopping facility for residents
City Centre Me’aisem is a community mall near Prime Villas with a wide range of entertainment activities, dining options and shopping outlets. Located at an 8-minute drive, one can find Carrefour Hypermarket, Magic Planet – a family entertainment centre and H&M at City Centre Me’aisem.
First Avenue Mall is another shopping venue near the villa community. With more than 50 high-street retailers and 15 food and beverages café, the shopping mall is an all-week-round destination for families living in the neighbourhood. Other shopping malls nearby are The Springs Souk and Al Barsha Mall.
RESTAURANTS NEAR PRIME VILLAS
There are plenty of dining options available near the villa community
Inside City Centre Me’aisem, you’ll find:
Paul
Gazebo
Tim Hortons
Dunkin Donuts
Baskin Robin
Starbucks
A few of the established restaurants near Prime Villas are,
Nathalie’s
Pulcinella Restaurant
Wingstop
Copper Kettle Restaurant
Wagamama Restaurant
Pulcinella Restaurant offers Italian and Mediterranean cuisine
Pulcinella Restaurant is known for Italian and Mediterranean cuisine and seafood. The restaurant imports ingredients from Europe to preserve the authentic flavours of the food. It is located at a 4-minute drive.
Fast food lovers can head to Wingstop offering a wholesome range of boneless and classic wings with the flavour of your choice. The restaurant is at a 4-minute drive, near Eagle Heights. Other famous eateries near the community are Reddy Roast, The Village Grill and Desert Wok Restaurant.
beaches-near:
Al Sufouh Beach is a perfect spot for beachgoers of the community
Al Sufouh Beach, also known as the secret beach is a short drive of 19 minutes from the neighbourhood. Al Sufouh is outshined by other beaches in Jumeirah that’s why it is famous for being a secret beach. Other beaches near Prime Villas are JBR Open Beach, JBR Marina Beach and Kite Beach by Meeras. These beaches offer a wide range of water sports activities and dining options.
LEISURE ACTIVITIES AND NOTABLE LANDMARKS
A few of the remarkable leisure spots near Prime Villas are,
Dubai Autodrome
Phobia Dubai
Al Qudra Cycling Track
Dubai Autodrome is a popular leisure spot in Sports City
Dubai Autodrome is UAE’s first fully-integrated sports and entertainment destination for motorsports enthusiasts. There is a 5.39km long circuit with six different configurations sanctioned by FIA. To facilitate the spectators, a Grandstand Retail Plaza and the Motorsport Business Park have been set up. Dubai Autodrome is an ideal location for large corporate events.
Phobia Dubai is a popular leisure destination. In a 60-minute game of ‘escape from the room’, you’ll be locked at some unusual place and to escape from the room, you need to understand and complete the mission. Your team for this game can consist of 2-5 persons with a minimum age of 6 years accompanied by adults. The entry ticket price starts at AED 115 per person.
86 kilometres long Al Qudra Cycling Track on Al Qudra Road is a popular destination among adventure seekers in Dubai. The track is utilised by athletes, cycling clubs and leisure riders in Dubai. Along the track, one can catch the glimpse of wildlife creatures or take a rest at available restrooms.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
The community centre in Prime Villas has a swimming pool, sauna and fitness centre facilitating residents.
FitRepublik offers more than 350 classes a week in three spacious studios for fitness enthusiasts. The studio and group exercise classes work for those who need motivation. The fitness centre is accessible within a 3-minute drive. Victory Heights Community Gym and Lotus Holistic Yoga Centre are other options for fitness clubs nearby.
The Organic Glow Beauty Lounge is UAE’s first completely green salon providing its customers with safe and toxic-free treatments at an affordable price. The beauty lounge is known for friendly service and utmost relaxation for mommies-to-be. To make yourself relax after a hectic schedule, Chi Nails Spa is the best option. the spa has cost-effective and luxury weekend treatments and customized massages in their services. Both these salons are easily accessible within a 15-minute drive. Other spas nearby are Reflections Massage Centre and Thai Professional Spa.
community-events: The Dome is a multipurpose indoor sports field in Dubai Sports City known for hosting sports tournaments and community events. Residents can enjoy two weeks full of colourful activities in the largest annual folk festival Oktoberfest, football events and other sports activities at the Dome. Cricket fans can head towards Dubai International Cricket Stadium for a glimpse of the sport.
social-community-groups:
Residents can join Facebook groups to stay connected with other community members. These include Sports City Community Dubai and Dubai Sports City Community Events.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
Prime Villas is a peaceful residential community in Dubai Sports City offering well-designed residences. Before moving to the area, one thing to keep in mind is that there are several projects under construction which can result in noise and dust pollution. For the comfort of community members, the projects are said to be completed within a year.
FAQS ABOUT PRIME VILLAS
WHERE IS PRIME VILLAS DUBAI LOCATED?
Prime Villas is a villa community in Dubai Sports City set on the southern end of the parent community.

about-: District 12 is part of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC), which is a gated community built in an urban village setting. Jumeirah Village Circle is a project by the pioneer Nakheel Properties. District 12 consists of villas townhouses and apartments, surrounded by landscaped gardens and with easy access to all amenities of life. District 12 is bordered by Hessa Street (D61) on the eastern side and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) on the southern side.
in-a-nutshell:
Project of Nakheel Properties
All the amenities of life present nearby
Sub-community of Jumeirah Village Circle
Community-based on village-style setting
Well-connected to the rest of the city via Al Khail Road (E44)
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
District 12 is a promising project of Nakheel Properties that has open spaces, spacious homes and beautiful surroundings. The following aspects characterise District 12:
A gated community, with complete security and privacy for residents.
5-minutes away from both entrances and Al Khail Road (E44).
Property types include villas, townhouses and apartments.
District 12 has a wide street network, traffic congestion is not a problem here
District 12 is on the southern side of JVC, near the central park. There is a good number of supermarkets, schools, pharmacies, restaurants and retail shops close to District 12.
properties-in:
District 12 has all the property types that JVC has to offer. Apartments, villas and townhouses available for rent and sale come with modern facilities like CCTV security and waste disposal systems.
All the properties have good access to all the amenities and the road network within the community. There are separate parking spaces for all property types. Townhouses and villas come with private lawns/gardens.
Elegant double and triple-storey villas and townhomes are the highlights of the area

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN DISTRICT 12
The properties come with private parking spaces in District 12, so parking has never been an issue for its residents.
Street car parking is permissible outside residential properties
JVC is centrally located in the city and surrounded by important areas. Residents will find it easy to commute to important places in the city including top malls, entertainment places and commercial hubs.
Al Khail Road (E44) is about 5-minutes away, whereas Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311) is about 7-minutes from District 12. Sheikh Zayed Road (E11) is also nearby and will take about 15-minutes to reach. These three roads connect the area to the rest of the city.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR DISTRICT 12
The public transportation near District 12 is mostly buses as there are plenty of bus stations within the community. The nearest bus station is JVC Nakheel Villas T12 1, just a 3-minute walk away. JVC Emirates Garden Rose 2 Apartments 1 bus stop and JVC Qamash Blvd A-1 bus stop are the other two bus stations in District 12.
Dubai Internet City Metro Station is the nearest
Taxis are also available but outside the community gates. Dubai Internet City Metro Station 2 is the nearest metro station and is about 12-minutes away.
AMENITIES, SCHOOLS AND HEALTHCARE
SUPERMARKETS IN DISTRICT 12
There are a few small-scale marts in District 12 including:
Aswaaq Mart -JVC
Holiday Minimart
Tfaddal Grocery Shop
Holiday Minimart is a small grocery store in District 12, JVC
Supermarkets near district 12 include some of the best supermarkets in Dubai. Popular names like Spinneys and West Zone Fresh Supermarket are less than 5-minutes away for residents of District 12. Other options include Cistys Supermarket, All Day Minimart, The Express Cart Supermarket JVC and New Jame Jam Supermarket.
mosques-near:
District 12 residents can access any of the four community mosques in JVC including, Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Mohammad Yousuf Sharaf which is the closest one among all. Located at walking distance from the area, Fatma Mosque is the first mosque in JVC and was developed by Nakheel Properties. Other mosques near District 12 are Saleh Mohammed Bin Lahej Mosque, Circle Mall Mosque and Abdullah Mohammad AlShirawi Mosque.
Masjid Fatma Al Sayed Muhammed Yousuf Sharaf also known as Fatma Mosque
other-places-of-worship:
The nearest church is The Winning Generation Gospel Assembly in Al Barsha, about 13-minutes away. Residents belonging to the Hindu faith can travel to Shiva Temple, Shree Krishna Haveli and Shiridi Sai Baba Mandir in Al Fahidi. Hindu Temple in Jebel Ali is a more convenient option, located at a 20-minute drive. Guru Nanak Darbar in Jebel Ali Village, about 19-minutes away, is the nearest Sikh Gurudwara. Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple in Al Garhoud is there to facilitate the Buddhist community.
SCHOOLS NEAR DISTRICT 12
There are plenty of nurseries and schools near District 12, within JVC and outside. Popular ones include:
Little Wonders Nursery Dubai JVC (6-minutes away)
Kids World Nursery JVC (5-minutes away)
Chubby Cheeks Nursery JVC (5-minutes away)
Chubby Cheeks Nursery is part of a popular chain of nurseries and pre-schools in UAE. The nursery has spread its branches through the provision of a suitable learning environment and well-trained teaching staff.
Schools near District 12 include:
JSS International School (6-minutes away)
Sunmarke School (16-minutes away)
Nord Anglia International School Dubai (15-minutes away)
JSS International School is developed by JSS Mahavidyapeetha (JSSMVP), which runs about 125 schools in India, the USA, Mauritius, and UAE. The school follows the Indian Curriculum for students from Kindergarten to Grade 12. The school provides an opportunity for students to participate in extra-curricular activities like Swimming, Basketball, Chess, Athletics, Squash, Cricket, Football, Yoga, Volleyball and Table Tennis. The school is located within the JVC.
JSSIS provides one of the leading curriculums (ICSE)
clinics-and-hospitals-near:
Just like other areas of Dubai, JVC has plenty of healthcare facilities nearby. The top Clinics and Hospitals near District 12 are:
Right Health Karama Medical Center (Jumeirah Village branch) (5-minutes away)
Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Center, Motor City (14-minutes away)
Mediclinic Parkview Hospital (15-minutes away)
Emirates Hospital Day Surgery & Medical Center and Mediclinic Parkview Hospital are counted among the top hospitals in Dubai. Their high rating is due to their excellent services for patients suffering from different ailments. Both these hospitals have the latest medical equipment and professional staff.

LIFESTYLE
SHOPPING, DINING AND NIGHTLIFE
MALLS NEAR DISTRICT 12
Residents will find numerous shopping centres and malls near District 12. Popular ones include:
Circle Mall
Al Barsha Mall
Mall of the Emirates
Circle Mall is a cutting-edge lifestyle meets food retail space
Circle Mall serves as a community retail centre for the residents of JVC. Located in District 11, the mall has around 80 retail outlets and 40 dining options. A large space is dedicated to the indoor state-of-the-art gym and hypermarkets like Nesto and Spinneys. Some popular shops in Circle Mall include:
Adidas
Forever 21
Bath & Body Works
Mall of the Emirates is one of the best malls in Dubai. It houses more than 600 stores, which ensures a wide range of shopping options. Apart from shopping, activities at the Mall of the Emirates include watching movies at VOX Cinemas and rock climbing at Go Sports Outlet. The mall is also home to Ski Dubai.
restaurants-near:
There are numerous restaurants near District 12 which are located within JVC. Popular ones include:
Coop Restaurant
Lokmat Baladna
Desert Wok Restaurant JVC
Jeita Restaurant
Golden Plates Restaurant
Teeneh ow Zeytoneh
Wide Range Restaurant JVC
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen
Lokmat Baladna serves authentic Lebanese food
There are some more restaurants located in JVC. All these restaurants provide a wide range of cuisine and dining style choices. Residents of District 12 will find furthermore options in neighbouring areas of JVC, which are also easily accessible.
beaches-near:
One of the most attractive things about Dubai is a visit to one of its exotic beaches. The nearest beaches for residents of District 12 are JBR Beach, Kite Beach and the open beach in Jumeirah. All of them are less than 30-minutes away and offer a wide range of beach activities including volleyball and swimming. The beaches also have a good variety of food available at the nearby restaurant.
LEISURE ACTIVITIES AND NOTABLE LANDMARKS
For golf lovers, JVC and its surroundings are exceedingly attractive. Two of Dubai’s most popular golfing facilities are located nearby. The Address Montgomerie and The Els Golf Club have various dining and retail options along with the golf courses.
Dubai Miracle Garden is a family-favourite place to hang out
Dubai Miracle Garden and Butterfly Garden are located less than 15-minutes away. Dubai Miracle Garden is a one-of-a-kind garden which exhibits 2D and 3D floral sculptures. The park is open to the public in the winter months each year. Dubai Butterfly Garden is located adjacent to the Miracle Garden. This temperature-controlled indoor recreational facility is home to around 15,000 butterflies belonging to over 50 different species.
outdoor-activities,-fitness-and-beauty:
The JVC has 33 landscaped parks within its boundaries, which are extremely popular with couples and families living in the community. People can spend their leisure time strolling and jogging along the tracks under the array of well-maintained trees.
Out of these 33, at least 3 community parks are located in District 12 which are Khansour Community Park, JVC Community Park – henna park and JVC 1 District 12 Park.
JVC also has a number of gyms, which are all easily accessible from District 12. Popular ones are Prime Fitness JVC, New Life Fitness Gym, R Boot Camp and Backyard.
There are plenty of spas and salons in District 12 as well. Some of them are:
Blue Beach Gents Salon
Spirals Salon
Amyioshka Nail Boutique
There are other options for self-care in JVC, which are all located close to District 12. The salons and spas for both men and women are easily accessible from District 12.
community-events: The Address Montgomerie regularly holds events related to golf around the year. People who are interested in golfing events would find it an attractive option.
social-community-groups:
Residents of District 12 can join a number of Facebook groups to interact with other residents and discuss matters related to the community. A few of those groups are Jumeirah Village Circle Community, Jumeirah Village Circle, Jumeirah Village Circle – Residents and Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC) Pet Owners.
THINGS TO CONSIDER
Life in Jumeirah Village Circle is peaceful, luxurious, convenient and secure. It is a family-focused community, bachelors who love to party and like to have a nearby spot for nightlife might not find it appealing. But people who want to live away from the hustle and bustle of the big city would like this community.

Casa Royale II is a small residential community in District 10 of Jumeirah Village Circle (JVC). JVC is one of the most popular areas in Dubai for renting and buying villas. Potential residents are especially attracted to its village-like setting, which makes it different from all other communities in the city.
Casa Royale II is a project of Nakheel Properties. It is a row of 10 townhouses, completed in 2015. The community is well-equipped in terms of facilities and its surroundings have several amenities for added convenience.
in-a-nutshell:
Located in District 10, JVC
Prompt reach to Al Khail road (E44)
A secure and serene community environment
Properties consist of 5-bedroom triplex townhouses 
Plenty of facilities and amenities available for residents
A Project of Nakheel Properties, the pioneer in the real estate industry
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
community-overview:
Just like the rest of Jumeirah Village Circle, Casa Royale II has a village-style setting and plenty of open spaces between the properties. The community has the following characteristics:
A small community of 10 townhouses.
A gated community with plenty of facilities.
Central location; easily accessible from important areas and destinations.
Casa Royale II is located on a wide street in JVC
The parent community has a good set of facilities and amenities. The residents of Casa Royale II can easily find numerous schools, pharmacies, supermarkets, restaurants and retail shops nearby.
properties-in:
Properties in Casa Royale II contain G+2 townhouses with 5-bedrooms. The total built-up area of these properties is around 3,800 sq. ft. The townhouses in Casa Royale II feature spacious dining and family areas on the ground level along with a maid’s accommodation. All bedrooms are ensuite and have sizeable balconies along with a built-in cupboard facility. There is a total of 6 bathrooms in the townhome along with a covered parking garage.
Neatly aligned triplex townhomes in Casa Royale II
The townhouses have excellent architecture and plenty of open spaces around them. The streets are wide and make a good network of commutes within the community. All townhouses in Casa Royale II have covered parking spaces and private landscaped gardens.

TRANSPORTATION AND PARKING SPACES IN CASA ROYALE II
There is no trouble regarding parking spaces in Casa Royale II. The residents can park two vehicles in the private parking area inside their townhouse boundary.
It is quite convenient to commute to other areas of the city from Casa Royale II. It takes hardly 2-minutes to get to Al Khail Road (E44) and about 10-minutes to reach Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311). Sheikh Zayed Road (E11) is also just 10-minutes away.
PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION NEAR CASA ROYALE II
Public transportation near Casa Royale II is also quite easy to find. Taxis can be hailed from outside the community gates and online cab services like Careem, Uber and Dubai Taxi are also available.
It takes a walk of about 2-minutes to reach the nearest bus stop JVC Westar La Residencia. JVC Hanover Square and JVC Manhattan Tower are the other two bus stops at a walking distance of 4 to 6-minutes. Sheikh Zayed Road has a number of metro stations that can be reached in about 10 to 15-minutes. The nearest one is the Dubai Internet City Metro Station 2, approximately 10-minutes away from the community.
Dubai Internet City Metro Station

supermarkets-near:

Choithrams and Spinneys are popular supermarket chains operating all over the UAE. The nearest outlet of Choithrams is accessible in 3-minutes on foot. The superstore is known to stock not only food items but also household items and baby care products. Imported goods like Fruit-tella and Weetabix are also available at the store. VIVA Supermarket is located at a walking distance of about 8-minutes. It is a discounted store which offers grocery items at lesser prices than the open market.

about-:
Discovery Gardens is a residential area located within the district of Jebel Ali between Sheikh Zayed Road (E11) and Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Road (E311). Hence, it is also called Jebel Ali Discovery Gardens. The community was one of the popular family-friendly projects to take off near the Jebel Ali Free Zone. It is a particular favourite among expatriate families who commute frequently to the neighbouring commercial zones.
One of the first few family-friendly communities in Dubai
Spanning 26 million sq. ft., the project by master developer Nakheel was completed in 2008. Discovery Gardens features spacious multi-sized apartment towers surrounded by lush foliage and manicured lawns. Most importantly, it is one of the top areas to rent studios in Dubai at market-competitive prices.
Buildings in Discovery Gardens are arranged in six ‘garden living’ themed clusters: Contemporary, Cactus, Zen, Mediterranean, Mogul and Mesoamerican. There are nearly 300 buildings in the area featuring more than 26,000 affordable studio, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments. Residents will also find a metro station, three medical centres, 200 shops and a complete community retail centre. There are wide open spaces and landscaped gardens outside the buildings with various amenities.
in-a-nutshell:
Developed by Nakheel Properties
Garden-themed residential clusters
One of Dubai’s best places for walking
A freehold community
Offers apartments in studio, 1 and 2-bed layouts
A family-friendly and affordable neighbourhood
In proximity to Ibn Battuta Mall
Quick access to the main roads in the city
Home to Discovery Gardens Metro Station on Route 2020
home
NEIGHBOURHOOD
The rectangular-shaped community is near the main road network and the popular residential districts of The Gardens, Al Furjan and Jebel Ali Village. One key factor behind the area’s popularity is easy accessibility. Residents can use the Discovery Gardens Metro Station, which lies on Route 2020 of the Dubai Metro. This Discovery Gardens area guide showcases all the essential information for those considering moving or living here.
community-overview:
Discovery Gardens is a modern residential community with lush green landscapes. The 6km long residential stretch comprises over 26,000 apartments.
Proximity to Ibn Battuta Mall and Dubai Marina makes living in Discovery Gardens ideal for families, singles and young couples looking to enjoy the various perks of this bustling city.
Low-rise residential buildings with grand open spaces
properties-in:
Discovery Gardens houses nearly 300 low-rise buildings featuring over 26,000 apartments. The residential properties on offer are quite popular in Dubai’s real estate market with a high occupancy rate making the community a sought-after residential address.
Buildings in Discovery Gardens Dubai have aesthetically pleasing architecture based on different design palettes. Apartments are distributed across six districts, each with its distinct characteristics. Also, more than 30% of the area is dedicated to open spaces. There are no high-rise buildings in Discovery Gardens. Therefore, residents can experience a tranquil lifestyle.
Offering studio, 1 and 2-bedroom apartments, Discovery Gardens is mostly a preferred choice of individuals and couples. There are 3-bedroom apartments as well, but those are a rare find compared to the other popular configurations. Discovery Gardens is the place to be if you are searching for the best areas in Dubai to buy studios at affordable rates. Here, you will find a range of options under AED 500k.
Some of the apartment buildings in Discovery Gardens
The community aspect is one of the biggest benefits of living in Discovery Gardens. Extremely popular with the expat community, the area is favoured in particular by students, bachelors and young families looking for something close to work and school in terms of accommodation. One thing to remember is that the apartment blocks may not be pet-friendly. Tenants must check with their landlord before bringing any pets into the community.
